name.en: Special Topics of Instrumental Analytical Chemistry

description.zh: 由量子化學及結晶化學等理論為基礎，討論一些分析儀器的原理，構造及應用。特別是原子光譜法，電化學分析法及離子層析儀及質譜儀等，針對無機物之分析方法。
description.en: Considering the theories of quantum and crystal chemistry, discuss the theories, structure and applications of some instruments.  Those are used for chemical analysis, especially for inorganic materials: atomic spectroscopy, electrochemical analysis methods, ion-exchange chromatography and mass spectroscopy.

description.zh: 為保障著作人著作權益，調和社會公共利益，促進國家文化發展，國家特制定著作權法；本課程重心在於介紹我國著作權法之內涵，包含該法所保護之「著作」範圍、權利人及著作權範圍、著作權管理及權利侵害之救濟等，除講授理論外，同時搭配案例解析，以期讓同學對著作權法有最完整之了解。
description.en: Copyright Act is specifically enacted for the purposes of protecting the rights and interests of authors with respect to their works, balancing different interests for the common good of society, and promoting the development of national culture. This course introduces the main meanings, concepts and contents of the Copyright Law. Including the scope for copyright protection, the kinds of works that qualify for copyright protection, the rights granted to copyright owners, the management of copyright, and remedies for right infringement. The discussion in the course covers theory and examples, to enhance a deeper understanding of Copyright for the students.

description.zh: 為保障商標權及消費者利益，維護市場公平競爭，促進工商企業正常發展，國家特制定商標法，本課程以介紹我國商標法為重點，主要內容包括商標規範之基本原理、商標之構成要素、商標之分類方式及各類型商標之特性與功能、申請商標註冊之程序、商標註冊之審查及核准、商標權之取得及行使、異議程序及紛爭處理、權利侵害之救濟等。
description.en: Trademark Act is formulated to safeguard trademark rights and the consumers' interest, maintain fair competition of markets, and facilitate normal development of industries and commerce. This course is focusing on the introduction of Trademark Act. Topics will mainly include the basic principle of trademark standard, the integrant part of trademark, the characteristic and the function of trademark, the application procedures, examination and approval, acquisition of the trademark rights and exercises, the procedure of opposition and the dispute processes, remedies for right infringement and so on.

notes: 共科513教室/英語授課/限7人/日職合開

name.zh: 數位匯流與智財法律專題
name.en: Intellectual Property Laws in the Age of Digital Convergence

description.zh: 在數位匯流的趨勢下，網際網路不但即將成為各種傳統媒體的聚集之處，同時也不斷衍生新型態的媒體傳播方式。有鑑於此，本課程目的即在探討數位匯流時代的智財法律議題。將由實際案例為主，輔以相關分析文章及法律規定的解析，帶領同學了解數位環境的特性、數位媒體形式與媒體內容的發展，同時針對著作權、隱私權等實用智慧財產權議題，讓同學了解、並具備分析數位時代的媒體趨勢、以及智財法律策略的能力。
description.en: In the face of digital convergence, the internet seems will not only become the ultimate channel for all kinds of traditional media, but the birthplace of new types. In light of the challenges posed by the digital age, this course is aimed at helping students explore the IP legal issues with reference to the media evolution on the internet. It will begin with the introduction of the characteristics of the internet, the developments of the digital media formation and content, and followed by the discussions and analysis on the cases in the real life.

notes: 中英授課/限7人/日職合開

name.zh: 科技發展與法律策略：案例研析
name.en: Technology Development and Legal Strategy: Case Study

description.zh: 在科技發展快速的年代，有些人認為產業和市場需要更多新的法律規範，也有些人認為舊有法律需要鬆綁。但無庸置疑地，法律在科技、產業與市場的發展中，扮演著一個攸關重要的角色。基於此，本課程嘗試以設計案例討論，鼓勵不同背景的學生，經由案例分析得到綜合性的知識、從中了解科技發展如何影響法律變遷，並進而學習專業的法律策略。
description.en: In an age of rapid technology advancement, some people might insist more laws are necessary to regulate the industry and the market, on the contrary, others might think de-regulation is the best approach to encourage the free flow of the market. Nonetheless, it is beyond question that law and regulations play an vital role in the technology-driven economy today. Therefore this course is designed to help students from various backgrounds to engage in the group discussions on assigned cases. Students are expected to learn how the technology development shapes the legal environment and learn how to analyze the legal strategies.

notes: 中英授課/限7人/日職合開

description.zh: 本課程重點在於台灣專利法的主要法律議題，包括產業利用性、新穎性、進步性、可實施性、說明書支持性、請求項不明確性、請求項解釋、侵權行為、救濟手段、專利授權、強制授權、專利訴訟之展開和舉發。本課程教材包括專利法教科書、智慧局頒發的專利審查基準和智慧財產法院裁判。
description.en: This course focuses on the main legal issues of the Taiwan Patent Law including industrial utility, novelty, inventive step, enablement, written description, claim indefiniteness, claim interpretation, infringement, remedies, patent licensing, compulsory licensing, initiation of patent litigation, and opposition. The class materials include a patent law textbook, patent examination guidelines issued by the Taiwan Intellectual Property Office and recent decisions from the Taiwan Intellectual Property Court.

name.en: Examination Guidelines for Patent and Utility Model (I)

description.zh: 本課程上學期將以智慧財產局頒佈之「專利審查基準」為藍本，依「先程式後實體」原則先就「程式審查」部分介紹專利申請之程式，再就專利申請之「實體審查」部分依序說明專利說明書暨圖式之構成、可專利類型、產業利用性、新穎性、進步性等專利要件。
description.en: This course will be based on the "Patent Examination Guidelines" issued by the Taiwan Intellectual Property Office, and introduces the procedure for patent application according to the principle of "formality before substantive examination". Firstly, in the "formality examination" section, topics such as the constitution of a patent specification and drawings, the allowable subject matter for patents, utility, novelty, inventiveness and other patent elements, the first-to-file rule, unity of invention, and the priority of an patent application, will be sequentially discussed.

description.zh: 本課程之目標在於從科學哲學層次、研究方法層次、與實際操作層次探討設計研究的本質，內容包括界定設計研究問題、選用適當的量化或質性研究方法與特定工具、研究結果詮釋、案例解析、以及論文寫作等，俾使同學具備研究之基礎觀念以及進行創作或理論論文寫作之能力。研究方法一強調量化研究，課程內容包含研究的基本概念、文獻探討、研究問題、研究變項、研究假設、研究設計、資料蒐集與分析、研究工具、研究樣本、研究倫理與研究論文撰寫等。教學以課堂講授與論文研討與發表為主要方式，並以隨堂測驗、報告與分組討論與發表為評量依據。
description.en: The aims of this course are to explore the nature of design research at the three various levels of scientific philosophy, research methods, and pr92tical execution. The contents involve the introduction of defining the design problems, selecting the quantitative or qualitative research methods and specific instruments, interpretation of research results, case studies, as well as writing a thesis. This research methods one focus on quantitative research that content details includes fundamental concept of research, literature review, research problem, research variables, research hypothesis, research design, data collection and analysis, research instruments, research samples, research ethics and writing up. The te92hing methods include lectures, paper discussion and presentation based on the course assessment of assigned project, panel discussion and individual/group presentation.

description.zh: 本課程規劃的目標為以互動設計的理論為基礎，實務導向為原則，使學習者能將學術界的理論與產業界的實務加以結合以充實對於互動設計具有全面性的了解。學習的內容包含互動設計系統構成要素、理論與實務基礎、互動設計方法與技術、科技支援與應用、認知心理、情境設計以及電腦支援協同合作等單元，各單元並包含不同互動設計個案的研討，使理論能與實務進行驗證。課程亦安排至相關領域業界的參訪，以加深對於互動設計實務的印象與了解。
description.en: The course aims to develop broad understanding on inter92tion design for students, based on theory and pr92tice course structure. Course topics include essential f92tors of inter92tive system, inter92tion design theory and pr92tice, inter92tion design methods and techniques, technical support and application, cognitive psychology, scenario design and CSCW. Course also incorporates case studies and company visits to enhance the understanding of integrating theory and pr92tice.

name.en: Special Topics on Inter92tive Media Design (I)

description.zh: 本課程之目標在於研討互動設計、互動媒體、互動藝術之相關研究專題，以文獻研讀、論文研讀討論以及個案研究為重點，藉由密集討論、書面報告以及設計專題之之研究與實作，學生可以有效率地交換意見，獲得更深入而廣泛的體驗，並具備研究、分析、實作之能力。本所以結合電子資訊、機電、人文、設計與藝術等各領域的學生，以整合培育互動媒體設計專業人才，因此，本課程之另一主要學習目標為建構一多元領域交互學習的環境，以專題導向式為學習模式，可分別組合具設計、藝術、資訊、機電等專長的研究生，協同完成互動媒體設計專題的研究，或是透過互動媒體設計個案研討、互動媒體設計專題創作的方式進行。教學將以課堂講授、論文研討與發表以及專題實作為主，並以報告、分組討論與發表以及實作作品為評量方式。
description.en: This course is to explore the fields of inter92tion design, inter92tive media and inter92tive art and focus on the literature study, paper discussion and case studies. With panel discussion, research report and design pr92tice, graduate students can be able to learn the ability of research, analysis and pr92tice by effectively exchange opinions and personal experience. The aim of graduate of inter92tive media design is to integrate different disciplines from computer science, mechatronics, human-culture and design and art so as to foster the professional of inter92tive media design. Therefore, one of the aims of this course is to construct multi-disciplines learning environment which perform a topic-oriented study model. This study model formulates the graduate students of design, art, information and mechatronic disciplines to collaborate an inter92tive media design project. It may execute inter92tive media design by working with the form of case study or design creation.

description.zh: 本課程之目標在於介紹使用者經驗設計之理論與研究方法。藉由本課程的學習，學生能習得互動設計過程中所需要之關鍵概念 - 以使用者經驗為中心之設計。課程以人-機-境之架構為基礎進行相關知識之講授，並透過相關研究案例之研討、方法之操作以及設計研究之進行了解其原理。課程內容包含人物誌、使用者經驗與需求、互動環境、使用者研究以及認知心理基礎等。教學將以課堂講授、文獻閱讀以及研究方法操作等方式進行，並以報告繳交、分組討論與發表為評量方式。
description.en: This course is focused on introducing the theories and research methods of User Experience Design (UXD). In this course, students can understand the key element, UX, of interactive design. This course is set up under the structure of Human-Machine-Scenario theory, and executed through research case studies, method simulation and design research. The contents include personas, user experience and requirements, interactive scenario, user research and cognitive psychology. The course is preceded by means of lecturing, literature review and research conducting. Students are evaluated by reports, group discussion and presentation.

notes: 日職合開/使用進修部教室/修課上限為18人

description.zh: 本課程將透過介紹及研讀創新服務的標竿案例，以了解創新服務的本質與實質效益。學生將透過共同研討與分組實作的的方式，針對不同場域及技術的創新服務，透過資源整合的方式，提出具體的創新服務專案，並提出其評估的方法。
description.en: This course will provide the student basics knowledge and practical benefits of the innovative services through benchmark case introduction and study. Students will collaborate to each other to propose practical innovation service project proposal in the aspect of resources management, technology applications, service mechanism and associated assessment methods  in various domains.

notes: 使用進修部教室/修課上限為20人

description.zh: 本課程旨在透過案例的企劃，協助學生從Web的設計領域，跨入到Mobile App的領域當中，可以充分發揮iPhone和Android的平台特色，做出真正具備使用者經驗的App (應用程式)。課程以實際分組討論結合 Paper Prototype的方式，以UCD（User-Centered Design）的精神，分組進行工作坊形式的體驗教學，企劃出具有創意並可行的應用程式。課程所談的App應用程式企劃，以iPhone和Android為主。
description.en: This course is to plan for application programming with concentration on user experience from PC design to mobile devices such as iPhone and Android. Curriculum and instruction characterizes paper prototype, cooperative learning, and workshop. Criteria for program evaluation are innovation, feasible and user-centered design.

notes: 使用進修部教室/修課上限為20人

description.zh: 讓學生瞭解製造業與服務業行銷的觀念和趨勢。主要包括以下課題：（1）消費者行為（2）市場區隔（3）產品策略（4）行銷通路（5）網路行銷（6）促銷（7）關係行銷。
description.en: The course teaches the student marketing concepts and trends. The topics will be covered: (1) consumer behavior, (2) marketing segmentation, (3) product strategy, (4) marketing channels, (5) online marketing, (6) relationship marketing.

description.zh: 策略管理主要是幫助製造業與服務業高階管理者作決策。一般而言，這門課程主要協助學員們具有策略思維與整合能力。學員可在策略管理學習過程活學活用，更能融合所學應用於管理決策中。此門課也採用適當的製造業與服務業個案研討來幫助學員學習、研讀與熟悉策略管理的運作，以達成此門課的目標。授課主題包括研討策略管理的本質與整體架構，瞭解組織所處環境 ， 分析外部環境之時機和危機， 剖析內部組織之優劣勢 ， 探討企業不同層次之應對策略，整合策略的執行與治理等。
description.en: Strategic management deals with the decision making in manufacturing and service industry at the top management level. Generally, this course provides students with strategic thinking and knowledge integration. With case studies in manufacturing and service industry, this course also helps students learn, study, and understand the process of strategic management well to achieve the goals of the course. Topics in this course include the essence and whole framework of strategic management, in what circumstances an organization has been, analyses on the opportunities and threats of external environment, the strengths and weaknesses of internal organization, application strategies of companies at different levels, implantation on integration strategies and so forth.

description.zh: 本課程之目標在於建構產業分析之思維架構及洞悉市場發展之研究能力，以因應市場之快速變遷,並介紹學生瞭解總體經濟與產業景氣分析,公司經營財務報表分析,投資標的評價與技術分析。透過研究方法之介紹及預測手法之教導並輔以個案實作以達其效。
description.en: The objective of the course is to construct the infrastructure of industry analysis and to build up the research capability for changing market development. The fundamental analysis of macro economy and business cycle, financial statement analysis and investment valuation methods are also studied. By introducing the methodologies and forecasting tools, the case study is implied in this class.

description.zh: 時序進入Web 2.0時代，網路行銷已不再停留在發e-mail而已了 為了破除這個迷思，本課程嘗試從Web 2.0的思維，以「個案」、「實務」二個導向為主要設計，將傳統行銷與新的網路行銷做一整合，從概念、理論、實務、到重要議題詳細闡述網路行銷的各個面貌。並介紹現今網路行銷重點議題，以簡單易懂的觀念與案例，一步步引導進入網路行銷的世界。 本課程探討一對一行銷與網路廣告、行銷網站建置與管理、網路行銷工具、行銷資訊系統、Google管理工具的應用、網路金流機制、關鍵字廣告、商業部落格、電子郵件與會員電子報廣告管理，一對一行銷，行動商務之網路行銷、網路行銷企劃案實務等重要議題，讓同學有網路行銷實務規劃之能力。
description.en: The Internet is becoming an important way to market your products and services. As a business owner, it is essential to understand the benefits of marketing on the Internet and the different options and technologies available. Simply having a web presence is not enough. Creating a website for your company is only the first step. Increasing usage of the Internet reduces traditional media's effectiveness as people give up their time for other activities such as watching TV and reading newspapers or magazines to the Internet. 1.Less costly compare to traditional advertising media 2.Increased exposure, no geographic boundary for Internet users 3.More personalized ads 4.More targeted audience 5.More accurate as it can be updated timely with minimal effort and cost 6.Easier to collect and track customer information.

description.zh: 本課程主要在介紹領導的藝術，以使學員瞭解中華傳統文化的觀點如何能增進組織治理的領導績效。課程主要涵蓋的內容包括：(1)領導的基本概念；(2)中華傳統文化的領導法則；(3)領導的案例研究；(4)領導的實踐。
description.en: This course introduces the art of leadership to the students helping them to understand how the concept of Chinese traditional culture can enhance the performance of leadership in organizational governance. Four major topics will be covered: (1) The basic concept of leadership; (2) the leadership principles of Chinese traditional culture; (3) case analysis of leadership; (4) leadership practices.

description.zh: 本課程期透過建立學生正確的研究觀念，以培養論文研究與寫作之基礎能力。根據論文寫作方法之需求，分別從建立正確的研究態度、質性研究、探索性研究設計、研究個案探討、論文格式及研究程序加以研討，讓學生了解研究方法的本質、研究的意義、過程與方法，以及研究設計的基本概念與特性；進而瞭解如何進行質性與量化研究、資料蒐集、資料處理與統計分析，並管理研究的設計與執行程序。此外，藉由本課程促使學生能應用各種不同的統計方法及統計軟體以分析商管領域等相關資料，學習撰寫研究論文並準備口頭報告，以培養商業管理研究論文之撰寫、闡釋、解讀並評析各式研究報告的能力。
description.en: The objectives of this course are： 1. To introduce the basic concept of research methodology that applies in academic and practical research. 2. To learn the methods of conducting research processes, designing research strategies, collecting and analyzing research data, and preparing research proposals and reports. 3. To know how to obtain the required information through appropriate approaches in writing research papers and solving management problems.

description.zh: 課程主要內容如下: 1.創業前的主要功課,產業分析鎖定及環境scan 2.創業的成功失敗因素分析 3.創業前的SWOT分析 4.創業專業知識->財務規劃及理財篇 5.創業專業知識->行銷管理篇 6.創業專業知識->資訊管理篇 7.創業專業知識->生產管理及產品研發 8.創業專業知識->人力資源及組織規劃 9.企業營運計畫書撰寫 10.企業營運財務試算 11.企業創業實務篇->加盟連鎖管理(1)--(8) 12.企業創業實務篇->個店經營管理(1)-(2)
description.en: The main content of this course include: 1. Environmental analysis. 2. The key factor to successfully start an enterprise. 3. SWOT analysis. 4. Financial forecast and financial management. 5. Marketing management. 6. Informational management. 7. Manufacturing management and new product design. 8. Human resources and organization management. 9. Start-an-enterprise operating program. 10.The try-balance-sheet of starting an enterprise. 11.Case study of a famous successful joined-ventured company. 12.Case study of a famous successful new-factional enterprise.

name.zh: 全球組織經營策略暨領導決策
name.en: Global Organization's Management Strategies and Leadership Decision

description.zh: 本課程專注在探討全球組織經營策略與領導決策之關鍵議題，聚焦在不同時空的國際經營環境中，企業經營者如何因應政府的政策與財經情勢改變，能夠快速回應與彈性應變的領導思維與決策。透過本課程將能夠理解高階主管面對政經環境的調整能有效因應變化，並且提升領導才能與創造市場優勢之創新能力。
description.en: The course focuses investigate the global organization's management strategies and leadership decision of the key issues. It is focusing in the different time frames and fierce international environment, how changes in policy of governments and situation of economic. Business executives will be able to quick to respond with the elastic strain of the global strategy perspective and leadership thinking. This course will be able to understand top managers can achieve the decision making of leadership, and improve the leadership knowledge and innovation capabilities in market competition.

description.zh: 本課程主要在介紹人力資源與組織管理的進階理論與實務，內容包括了(但不限於)人才任用、訓練與發展、績效評估、薪酬管理、組織設計、領導、工作激勵、以及工作團隊運作等等重要議題。課堂上並討論上述理論對於管理實務上的意涵。
description.en: This course introduces many advanced topics of human resource management, organization theory, and organization behavior. Topics include (but not limited to) staffing, training and development, performance appraisal, compensation, organization design, leadership, work motivation, workgroup functioning. Implications for managerial practice will be discussed in this class.

description.zh: 公司治理已成為廿一世紀企業組織架構調整之重大議題，如何經由管理策略及法制設計使台灣企業經營回歸股東長期價值及利益，為政府、交易所與公會等自律機關、及企業經營者必須面對之問題。在法制上，獨立董事監察人、審計委員會之設置、公司自律守則之擬議、股東會之運作，均衝擊我國公司法、證券交易法及交易所規則現行管理架構及規範；在實務上，上市櫃公司如何順利接受公司治理之理念及管理規範，以提昇公司營運的外在評價與體質。
description.en: The corporate governance had been the enterprise framework adjustment of the main issue of the 21 century. How do the manage the corporate strategy and system of the law to make the profit for the shareholder, government and enterprise. The main purpose of the course to help the learner to understand the law of corporate and the practice of the enterprise.

name.zh: 經營模式與智慧化企業

description.zh: 由於產業環境辦化及科技創新速度，影響企業之營運模式。本課程旨在針對因應產業/工業4.0調整，課中會針對企業經營模式變革與產業/工業4.0產業生態鏈變革探討。 除了理論解析外，本課程並輔以企業實務個案研討。
description.en: Due to the change of industry environment and the speed of technological innovation, the business models of enterprise are impacted. The purpose of this course will study the transform of business model and the impact of Industry 4.0 on the ecosystem of industry. In the course, besides the theory will be included, the business practices case will be also covered.

description.zh: 本課程的主旨在研討資訊管理的發展及新趨勢，內容包含資訊策略管理、資料庫管理、網路管理、電腦硬體技術、系統分析、軟體工程、管理資訊系統、決策支援系統、商業智慧、資訊倫理、資訊安全、知識管理、社會網絡等。
description.en: The focus of this course is on research and discussion of the developments and novel trends of information management. The topics include information strategy management, database management, network management, computer hardware developments, system analysis, software engineering, management information systems, decision support systems, business intelligence, information ethics, information security, knowledge management, social networks, and so forth.

name.zh: 雲端應用與大數據實務
name.en: Cloud Computing Applications and Big Data Practices

description.zh: 雲端運算是指透過網際網路進行擴充、消費或提供IT服務，顧客可隨時取用網路資源、軟體或資料之新模式。雲端運算不是一項全新技術，而是一項應用與服務創新的概念，「簡單的說，就是把所有的軟體或資料全部丟到網際網路上處理(Services on the Internet)」。雲端運算被視為新IT時代中最有影響力的整合技術之一，而大數據分析是它主要的應用，它亦是近年來資通訊(ICT)產業重要的趨勢與創新應用，是新一代的網際網路與資料中心(Data Center)。本課程主要內容包含雲端運算基本概念、雲端運算之服務與管理策略、以及雲端應用服務與個案實例。隨著雲端運算服務的廣為使用及網際網路服務的發展，已產生大量的數據，如何處理與儲存大數據、如何從大數據中，探勘有用的知識，成為近年來熱門的研究議題。本課程內容尚包括如何處理與儲存大數據以及選擇有關大數據分析之應用服務與實例個案於課堂上簡報與研討。
description.en: Cloud computing is not a new technology, but the concept of application and service innovation. In short, cloud computing is regarded as one of the new IT era's most influential technology integration. Big data analysis is its main application. The key trends and innovative applications, as well as  the internet and a new generation of data centers (data center) will be discussed. The main contents of this course include the basic concepts of cloud computing, applications and case examples of cloud computing services and management strategy, big data applications etc.    With the widespread use of cloud computing services and the development of Internet services, huge amount of data has been generated. How to deal with the huge amount of data has become a hot research issue. This course will also include how to handle and store huge amount of data and how to carry out further exploration from big data. Big data case studies and practices will also be conducted in the class.

description.zh: 本課程上半學期以R語言為工具，處理分析金融交易資料於股票期貨與選擇權等商品，包含理論模擬與實務分析。
description.en: In this course, we use R language as a tool to deal with the analysis of financial data in the stock, futures and options and other commodities, including theoretical simulation and practical analysis.

description.zh: 本課程主要闡述企業經營管理者於財務金融管理中最重要的財務金融基本架構與財務決策，結合資訊工具、財務軟體、財金資料庫及財金資訊網站的應用，並配合各項相關議題進行個案研討，以深入淺出方式介紹財金管理之基本觀念與理論架構，以結合財金管理實務並融入財務決策研討，培育理論與實務兼備之財金管理人才。本課程涵蓋企業在資金管理與財務規劃預測之相關議題，如：金融市場的功能與運作，金融工具的運用、金融資產的定價模式、實體資產評價與投資專案分析、資本結構分析以及風險管理等。透過本課程之學習，期許學生能具備財金管理領域之學科知識與專業技術整合能力、判斷性思考能力與決策能力，以及制訂並解決財金管理問題之能力。
description.en: This course is designed to introduce students to the theoretical and practical aspects of financial management and financial decisions by using case study, information tools, quantitative technique, financial software, and financial database. Several important concepts will be studied in detail, including: the operation and roles of financial markets, applications of financial instruments, financial asset pricing, capital budgeting decision, capital structure decision, and risk management. The course involves studies on decision-making utilizing financial resources available to the firm from the perspective of the manager. The basic financial concepts that will help students solve problems and exercises designed to financial strategies and corporate policies.

name.zh: 數位行銷與產品創新管理

description.zh: 隨著網際網路的盛行，電子商務迅速地蓬勃發展，經營網路行銷/數位行銷的需求，已經是每個公司所必需的。從新產品的開發、行銷、到售後服務均受影響。網路電子商務已經成為傳統行銷通路以外的一個新興通路。再加上網路全年無休、成本低廉、以全球為市場的優勢，以及可符合消費者的需求的特色，使得電子商務明顯的成為未來商業發展的主流。因此，如何經營數位行銷已是現代企業具有競爭力重要課題。  在數位行銷的潮流下，產品差異化和產品研發創新管理更是格外的重要。此課程主要內容包含了如何操作數位行銷，和產品研發創新管理。主要對象為有興趣從事數位行銷和企業產品研發創新發明機會或技能的學生們。此課程不僅介紹數位行銷和產品研發創新發明工具而且提供課程上實際演練。產品創新管理主要內容包含如何辨識企業產品研發創新機會與問題；發現新點子；發展最適解答；展示創新成果與萃思方法介紹。課程上也會提出許多相關企業的應用實例討論。 其目的在於幫助學生們學習了解創新工具與系統創新方法在產品研發創新管理的專業領域及利用課程上的產品研發創新工具。
description.en: E-marketing is the conducting of business on the internet, not only buying and selling but also servicing customers and collaborating with business partners. This course will introduce the e-marketing by the way of concept, theory and case study. This course will study how to develop the business on the internet. Production innovation is very important in e-marketing. Production R&D Innovation Management course focuses on the particular interest to those students who are considering Production R&D development of an innovative business opportunity or innovation management skills. This part of course not only discusses the basics toolkits for every innovator needs, but also provides the practice workshop of systematic innovation. Major topics include how to identifying the opportunity and problem of Production R&D; discover the new ideas; develop the solution; demonstrate the innovation; and the TRIZ works. Many of the examples will also be discussed in their entrepreneurial approaches

description.zh: 以消費者為重心已蔚為目前市場行銷的重要潮流。了解消費者決策過程也成為行銷領域研究的主流。一般而言，消費者的購買決策制定過程決定產品與服務的購買結果，主要包括五個階段：(1)問題察覺、(2)資訊搜尋、(3)方案評估、(4)購買選擇、(5)購後過程。消費者的購買決策制定過程深受各種不同因素之影響。這些因素大抵可分為兩個類別：個人內在因素（知覺、資訊處理與學習、記憶、知識、動機與涉入、價值觀、自我與人格、生活形態、態度、與情感等）與環境因素（行銷環境、購買情境、文化、團體與人際影響、家庭等）。本課程主要目標在使學生了解消費者決策過程與相關心理學、社會學、行銷學與廣告學原理之間的關係。課程以哈佛式個案討論為主。
description.en: The course teaches the student marketing concepts and trends. The topics will be covered: (1) consumer behavior, (2) marketing segmentation, (3) product strategy, (4) marketing channels, (5) online marketing, (6) relationship marketing.

description.zh: 本課程提供所有博士生共同參與研究討論的園地。將進行設計專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論。
description.en: This course is a joint seminar for all the doctoral students, which will be progressed by paper presentation of special topics on design issues, giving lectures, and group meeting.

description.zh: 本課程在討論金屬.陶瓷與高分子性質與應用在整形外科和牙醫界。課程內容包括生醫材料之發展,牙醫材料之應用,複合材料在生醫工程之應用,生醫陶瓷,生醫材料之腐蝕機制以及生醫材料之工程問題。
description.en: The topics of this course include the properties of metallic, ceramic and polymeric materials, and their applications in the orthopedic and dental fields. The course contains the development of biomaterials, the application of materials for dentistry and dental surgery, composite materials in biomedical engineering, bioceramics, corrosion mechanisms of metallic biomaterials and engineering problems associated with materials.

description.zh: 對無機化合物之結構，化學性質等，利用量子化學，群論及結晶化學等加以探討。以配合天然礦物之形成，產狀，地球化學及環境化學等學科之授課內容。
description.en: The chemical structure and properties of inorganic compounds, which are useful for the following courses: the forming and occurrence of minerals, earth and environmental chemistry, will be discussed by using quantum chemistry, group theory and crystallography.

description.zh: 以演講，討論，口頭及書面報告方式，探討土木與防災之相關課題，如結構檢測評估與補強，水土防災技術，防災體系與資訊，都市防災，消防防災，施工災變，環境防災規劃與管理等。
description.en: By means of addresses discussion, oral presentations and reports to learn and investigate the related civil and disaster prevention subjects, such as structure testing, evaluation and repairing, soil and water disaster prevention, urban precaution, fire fighting, construction safety, environmental planning, and management for disaster prevention.

description.zh: 本課程將有系統的介紹專業英文論文的寫作格式，以及文件編修的技巧，且用深入淺出的例子作為示範，並輔以實際寫作練習與錯誤訂正。學員學習研究論文組織寫作﹐包含修改本身論文結構之基本技巧﹐正確組織文章的各個片段﹐避免口語用字寫字的陋習﹐使所作之文章能掌握其涵意﹐亦即能更有效率的利用英文寫出科技論文之佳作。
description.en: The goal of English Technical Writing is to help students developing the writing skills through the manipulation of scientific and technical data. Students will learn a variety of rhetorical principles that guide the writing process, apply these principles to scientific and technical writing, and write papers in their own academic fields. Lectures on the writing principle, students' presentations on the reading sections and follow-up activities, pair and individual work on writing practice will be the major activities in the class.

description.zh: 本研究討論課程之目的在使研究生學習控制工程、通訊工程、計算機工程之最新科技。受邀演講之著名專家學者透過廣泛的討論分享其研究結果與經驗，選修此課程之研究生亦須就其研究主題進行正式報告。

Renowned researchers and scholoars are invited to share their research results and experience through extensive discussion. Furthermore, all students in this course are required to make formal presentations on their specialized topics.

What will be included in the class are: 1. concise review of sentence structure and grammar, 2. frequent writing mistakes of paper or report, 3. share of the experience in paper review, 4. offering simple and practical writing principles, 5. share the experience in reading and writing papers.

description.zh: 本課程是教導學生金融科技的基本概念，使學生能夠建立金融科技的創新應用。內容包括:金融科技概論、金融科技商業模式、P2P 借貸、虛擬貨幣、雲端服務、第三方支付、群眾募資、P2P 匯兌、區塊鏈、跨境電商、程式交易、機器人理財與期末專題製做。
description.en: This course is to instruct students the basic concepts of financial technology and to enable students to develop innovative applications of financial technology. The contents include introduction to financial technology, business models of financial technology, P2P lending, virtual money, third-party payment, crowd funding, P2P remittance, blockchain, cross-border e-commerce, program trading, and robotic financial advisory.

description.zh: 本課程在培養同學創業的知識與思維，以及了解營運模式如何應用在商業活動裡。本課程包含: 創業精神的想法和行動、從失敗中學習、設計思考、市場測試、機會衡量、營運模式建立、價值主張、永續經營、企業倫理等議題。
description.en: The course is to encourage students to have the ideas of entrepreneurship and to establish the abilities of running a business. This course is focused on: entrepreneurial thought and action, learning from failure、design thinking、opportunity evaluation、market tests、the development of business model、value propositions、network、sustainable and business ethics.

description.zh: 此課程教學目標在於幫助學生們針對未來就業市場，了解若要能有效地行銷，需具備之相關行銷概念、策略、技巧及明白行銷在公司策略中之角色定位。為因應全球國際化，課程也將特別著墨於顧客行銷與企業行銷之相似與不相似處。除此之外，還將包含行銷目標市場定位、行銷市場研究，最重要的是如何整合相關資源，作行銷策略之規劃、執行，並讓同學們擁有行銷人才需具備之相關技能。
description.en: The purpose of this course is try to help students prepare to operate in and contribute to the 21st century. Regardless of whether a person intends to work in a business, for the government, or in a nonprofit organization, the concepts, strategies, and techniques of effective marketing are relevant. This course is: Providing from fundamental concepts through the major tasks associated with marketing to the strategic role of marketing in an organization. Bringing early attention to the global nature of marketing. Emphasizing the similarities as well as the differences between consumer and business marketing. Combining demand forecasting with its logical antecedents-segmentation, targeting, and position. Covering marketing research, after students have been exposed to consumer and business markets and segmentation. Integrating planning, implementation, and evaluation to provide a broad strategic context after students have a grasp of what marketing entails.

description.zh: 本課程介紹大數據在各個領域決策制定的應用，課程內容包括大數據分析與應用、大數據管理、大數據分法與策略、資料探勘介紹、資料探勘方法、大數據平台、大數據行銷實務、大數據個案分析、期末專題製作與報告。學生可以經由多個案例學習大數據的應用實務、目前技術與未來發展方向。
description.en: This course explores the rapidly developing fields of big data for the efficiency of decision making in various fields. The topics are about basic concepts of data manipulations, analytic, and communications which are including: introduction to big data; basic knowledge of data mining; special topics of big data in business Analytics, and data analytic project. The course will help students careful consideration of what is desired from big data, how big data analytic to add value to business, etc. Students can gain a strong data science knowledge set and techniques via in-depth case studies, most current readings and experiences, and most current and future technology exploration.

name.en: Literature Research in Design and Research Strategy

description.zh: 講授設計相關學術研究的基本特質與科學方法的傳統。本課程旨在介紹蒐集研究資料的方法、文獻探討的方法與策略，並探討各種研究方法的特質與限制，引導學生以策略性的思考進行文獻探討並架構適當的設計研究策略，進而得以研擬具可行性的研究計劃。
description.en: Lecture on theories of academic research and characteristic of science approaches in research. This course focuses on conducting an design research and presenting learners with a variety of research methods. Through the classes, this course aims to conduct individuals through the process of (1) strategic literature research, (2) constructing proper research strategies and finally (3) organize feasible research plans.

description.zh: 本課程將透過每週專題演講方式，讓學生了解有機材料之最新開發成品或最先進之研究成果。演講者之安排將以校外知名專家學者及校內各計畫執行者為主。
description.en: This course will provide important information regarding to the latest development or application on the organic materials. Speakers being invited are well-known scholars in organic area.  Graduate students or thesis advisors will also be invited to report any in interesting result from their graduate studies.

description.en: This course is aimed at systematically introducing some important concepts of material engineering for students who were not an engineer training in their BS. description.en: The advanced course for inorganic chemistry is designed for graduates who plan to initiate their academic research in the chemical field or work in chemical plants. Organometallics provides not only the powerful tools for chemist in their research but also for chemical engineers in the design of their reactors.  The course covers the following topics: (1) Main-group organometallics (2) Organometallic compounds of the transition elements (3) Organometallics of the boron group (4) Organometallics of Copper, Silver and Gold (5) The 18-Valence-Electron (18-VE) Rule (6) s, p donors and acceptors (7) Organotin

description.en: This course is designed mainly for senior/graduate students. The objective of this course is to introduce active braking control system, such as ABS, TCS, ESP and SBC background. The mathematical model of the system and its applications for the controller design of braking system are also included.

description.zh: 1. 替代燃料的介紹。2. 替代燃料的分類。3. 車輛用植物性燃料、混合燃料和金屬/液態/氣態燃料電池的種類、應用以及未來發展。
description.en: 1. Introduction of alternative fuels. 2. Classification of alternative fuels. 3. Kind, application, and future of Vegetable Fuels, Blended Fuels, Metel/Liquit/Gas Fuel Cells for Vehicles.

description.zh: 本課程主要探討各種高分子之聚合方法及動力學之研究，如逐步聚合、遊離基連鎖聚合、乳化聚合、離子連鎖聚合、連鎖共聚合反應、開環聚合、立體規則高分子之合成，未終止的游離基聚合方法。從分子量的分佈，結構物性之關係，作高分子聚合之最佳化設計，並且探討這些聚合方法如何應用在最新的科技上，如光電材料、複合材料。
description.en: This course is to elucidate the polymer synthesis and Kinetics studies. The synthesis includes step polymerization, free radical chain polymerization, emulsion polymerization, ionic chain polymerization, chain copolymerization, ring opening polymerization, sterospecific polymerization and living free radical polymerization. The synthesis scheme is optimized with the structure-properties relationship and molecular design. The potential application of these methods in high-tech materials, such as optoelectronics, and composites, will be elucidated.

name.en: Special Topics of Instrumental Analytical Chemistry

description.zh: 由量子化學及結晶化學等理論為基礎，討論一些分析儀器的原理，構造及應用。特別是原子光譜法，電化學分析法及離子層析儀及質譜儀等，針對無機物之分析方法。
description.en: Considering the theories of quantum and crystal chemistry, discuss the theories, structure and applications of some instruments.  Those are used for chemical analysis, especially for inorganic materials: atomic spectroscopy, electrochemical analysis methods, ion-exchange chromatography and mass spectroscopy.

description.zh: 生物工程和醫療技術的研究和發展，在最近幾十年中，促成明確的臨床醫學和衛生保健的進步。這些領域的發展，開啟了生物工程、臨床技術和醫學信息領域課程的蓬勃發展；目前，各大學及研究所多有提供這些領域的課程。然而，大多數參與者多來自工程背景，因此學習生物科學和醫學應用於工程思維及模式，方能使得工程師和醫生之間的科學能無礙地交流。這項課程主要是為了使主修工程及材料的學生提供具有實用性的人體結構和組織的原則及相互依存的細胞和組織器官的生理系統進行有用的學習。雖然課程可能無法全然覆蓋所有生物醫學工程領域的基礎，但在這個學習過程中，我們將專注於大多數生物醫學工程以及生技和組織工程從事的主要研發領域作出努力。這門課程是醫學和工程及材料之間的橋樑。這將是促進各類工程及設計師和醫事人員之間文化和科學的交通和相互研習課程，促進生物醫學工程的創新發現和發展。在這個過程中，我們將提供一系列的生物學和醫學知識和方法，應用在工程、材料和電子領域，旨在幫助他們能將其整和連接，可以開始從工程進入生物醫學工程的專業，或者提供工程師期許能“簡單”理解特定臨床醫療科學和技術。經由醫學背景引導進入此領域，將結合工程及材料師長的經
description.en: Research and development in bioengineering and medical technology, conducted during recent decades, have led to spectacular progress in clinical medicine and healthcare. These achievements have triggered an enormous increase in the number courses offered in the areas of bioengineering, clinical technology and medical informatics; nowadays, most major universities offer curricula oriented towards these fields. The majority of participants however come from engineering background and so modules dealing with basic biological and medical sciences have been included, to the detriments of scientific exchanges between engineers and medical doctors. This study is primarily to give those majoring in the electronic and engineering students a useful glimpse of the principles of human structure and organization and of the interdependence of cellular and organ physiological systems. description.zh: 本課程旨在培養設計與實作軟體定義無線網路的能力。軟體定義網路由控制平面、資料平面與網路功能虛擬化等技術所構成，透過資料平面/控制平面設計，以軟體定義封包傳輸方式。本課程著重於這些軟體定義網路的技術於無線網路的設計，包含應用軟體定義網路在物聯網及 5G 通訊系統。本課程以實習方式利用 OpenFlow 實作控制器及交換器，使學生透過資料平面與控制平面技術的開發，瞭解軟體定義網路對於無線網路的影響。

Introduction of OpenFlow; 2. Data Plane; 3. Control Plane; 4. Network Function Virtualization (NFV); 5. SDN for Internet of Things (IoT); 6. SDN of 5G System.

description.zh: 本課程將介紹申請專利的相關規定，以及辦理其他有關專利事項，例如：申請分割、申請改請、專利權讓與、提起舉發等等，必須符合之程序要件；另外也將介紹台灣之新型專利相關之申請與審查作業。
description.en: In this course, we will focus on the practices of the patent application procedures and related regulations. In addition, utility model patent system in Taiwan is also presented.

description.zh: 本課程預期提供同學一個研習專利綜合學科的學習平台，其中課程內容包括演練與檢討專利法、專利審查基準、專利申請與代理實務、專利審查與專利侵害鑑定與訴訟實務等。經由這些課程學習，增加同學對於專利業務理解並對做好未來執業準備。	(限制：曾修過專利法、專利審查基準I/II、或專利代理與申請實務者修習)
description.en: This course is prepared to give students a comprehensive understanding of complexities of multiple patent related practice, including patent law, patent examination guidelines, patent prosecution, patent infringement and analysis and other patent practice.  The students are expected to possess the ability to handle patent application practice in the future after completion the course.

notes: 曾修過專利法及專利審查基準，或專利代理與申請實務者

description.zh: 本課程旨在教導學生瞭解各類化工程序模式的建立以及其求解的方法。內容包括：輸送動態方程式之建立，線性、非線性、矩陣、微分方程等之轉換及求解。
description.en: The goal of process simulation is to develop numerical analysis techniques that allow students to simulate the behavior of a chemical process. The contents involving：the development of dynamic equations of transport, the transformations and solutions of linear, nonlinear matrix, and differential equations.

name.zh: 軟性電子材料與元件應用
name.en: Soft Electronic Materials and Device applications

description.zh: 本課程目的在於建立學生有關於軟性半導體與元件應用之相關技術與知識，並在學期中讓學生實際動手製備與量測有機半導體元件，以對於有機半導體應用有更深入的認識。課程主題主要(1)有機半導體物理介紹；(2) 有機半導體元件製程與封裝技術；(3)有機發光二極體(OLED)元件應用；(4) 有機場效應電晶體應用；(5)有機太陽能電池；(6)有機記憶體元件應用；(7)有機感測器應用；(8) 奈米碳材元件。
description.en: The goal of this class is to build basic knowledge about organic semiconductors and device applications. Students will also learn how to fabricate organic electronics and have further understanding. The main topics of this class include (1) physics of organic semiconductors; (2) device fabrications and processes; (3) organic light-emitting diodes; (4) organic field-effect transistors; (5) organic solar cells; (6) organic memory; (7) organic sensors; (8) carbon nanomaterial devices.

name.en: Special Topics on Characteristics of Polymers

description.zh: 介紹高分子分子結構、型態學、流變學、化學性質、熱性質、機械、電學及光學等特性之分析方法及實例。
description.en: This course will cover the examples of analysis of the mechanical, thermal, electrical, optical and chemical properties, and the structure, morphology, and rheology of polymers.

description.zh: 本課程要從西方都市設計理論談起，到台灣本地實踐。希望拉出都市設計如何想像和實踐，及其歐美與亞洲不同的都市設計內涵。並更進一步討論在後全球化、後工業化與市民社會下，21世紀都市設計新嘗試與可能性。
description.en: Urbanization was the most great trends and issues around the globe in 20 century. There will be 70% population lived in the urban area in 2050. Therefore, what the urban is, how to design the urban, and how to regenerate the urban is a very important acknowledge, especially for Architect and Planner. Urban design was technologies of the Kings rulings in past years. Along with the modernity era coming, urban design becomes a technologies for human scale and aesthetics, which response the disabilities of urban planning. Many of theories, approaches and tools are introduced in urban design groups which expect to improve urban society and environment. In the meant time, developmental thinking is a mainstream in city population, driving city growth and wrecking human scale of the city, which urban renewal policy was introduced in the city politics. There are extremely contradiction between urban design and urban renewal. Urban is an unhappy society, we must live in.How to solve the

name.en: The housing Development and urban Policy

description.zh: 針對學生在建築設計及都市規劃基礎訓練之後，有異於前期以技術性思考，改以都市開發及宏觀政策及微觀個案財務之角度切入建築及都市開發之議題，以輔助學生建立都市開發與都市型態間關連性之整合概念。
description.en: After the technical approaches in urban planning and building design, the financial and political issues are to be taken into consideration in urban affairs. The micro- financial plan in developments and the macro- political issues in housing policy would be introduced to the urban planning practice.

name.en: The earthquake-proof performance principle and the character

description.zh: 本課程將介紹現今用各種結構系統〔耐震、免震（隔震）、制震（減震）〕的特性及耐震性能原理，由基礎力學理論配合應用實務設計做一統括整理解說。並從地震中建築物實際破壞狀況的解說到耐震診斷及耐震補強技術做一現況的解說與說明。
description.en: The earthquake-proof performance principle and the characteristic of the structural system (1.General structure 2.Base isolation structure 3.Virbration control,Damper) being used well now are introduced at this course, and lectures from the mechanics theory of the base to a aactual design. In addition, the destruction situation and the earthquake-proof diagnosis reinforcement in the building are explained due to the earquake.

description.zh: 本課程的目的是研究人與環境互動的關係，介紹環境心理學發展的過程及相關的理論。並藉由觀察與評估現有生活環境中的行為，增進我們對環境心理學中在理論與經驗上不同取向的瞭解。課程內容包括1.緒論2.研究方法及理論架構 3. 建成環境，由家環境到城市空間4.社會行為及實質環境5.自然環境與行為6.使用者用後評估7. 結論
description.en: The purpose of this course is to explore the interaction relationships between human and environment, introducing the development and theory of environmental psychology. Via observing and evaluating the behavior of present living environment, enhance our knowledge about environmental psychology through various approaches to theories and experiences. The course includes:1. Introduction  2. Research methods and theory framework 3. The built environment from home environment to city space 4. Social behavior and the physical environment 5. The natural environment and behavior 6. Post-occupancy evaluation 7. Conclusion

description.zh: 1.電化學機構─似乾電池，法拉第定律2.腐蝕驅勢和電極電位─Nernst方程式，電位─pH圖3.極化和腐蝕速率─Evans圖4.鈍態理論─氧化膜理論和吸附理論5.防蝕法─陰、陽極防蝕法和抑制劑、鈍態劑防蝕6.八大類濕式腐蝕形態7.高溫腐蝕
description.en: Course Outline：1.Electrochemical Mechanisms─dry cell analogy and Faraday's law2.Corrosion Tendency and Electrode Potentials─Nernst equation, Pourbaix diagrams3.Polarization and Corrosion Rates─Evans diagrams4.Theories of Passivity─oxide film theory and adsorption theory of passivity5.Corrosion Prevention─cathodic and anodic protections, inhibitors, passivators6.Eight forms of Corrosion7.High Temperature Corrosion

name.en: Patent application procedures and utility model patent

description.zh: 本課程將介紹申請專利的相關規定，以及辦理其他有關專利事項，例如：申請分割、申請改請、專利權讓與、提起舉發等等，必須符合之程序要件；另外也將介紹台灣之新型專利相關之申請與審查作業。
description.en: In this course, we will focus on the practices of the patent application procedures and related regulations. In addition, utility model patent system in Taiwan is also presented.

description.zh: 1. 電壓型變頻器控制 2 電流型變頻器控制 3. 交流電機模式4. 雙向變頻器系統 5.變頻器系統模擬
description.en: 1 VOLTAGE SOURCE INVERTER CONTROL 2. CURRENT SOUR INVERTER CONTROL 3. MODELING OF AC DRIVES4. 5IDIRECTIONAL INVERTER SYSTEM 5. SIMULATION OF INVERTER SYSTEM

description.zh: 1.簡介2.線性區段碼3.循環碼4.迴旋碼5.編碼調變
description.en: 1.Introduction2.Linear Block Codes3.Cyclic Codes4.Convolutional Codes5.Coded Modulation

description.zh: 本課程主要在講述工業催化製程開發之基本原則，管理方法，技術突破的執行要領及策略運用，並探討數個工業催化製程開發成功與失敗的實際案例。授課內容從化工產品的生產技術演變特性及組織架構，歷史經驗的分析開始。產品以石化產品為例，論及原料來源的轉變，工廠設備技術的進步。進而講述工業催化製程在工業催化劑功能開發及製程技術革新下，雙管齊下，如何達成工業催化製程開發的目標。
description.en: This course is designed to introduce the basic principles, management, skills to reach technology break-through, and strategy for the development of industrial catalytic process. Real cases of the success and failure of development of industrial catalytic process in chemical industry will also be reviewed. Contents of the lectures will start with the analysis of the evolution, the industry structures and historical experience of chemical industrial products.      Using petrochemical products as examples, we will discuss the shift of the raw materials, the progress of plant equipments,  and how chemical engineers simultaneously address the developments of improved catalyst and process technology to accomplish the mission of the development of catalytic process in chemical industry.

notes: 大三、四及化工所合開,初選人數限制12人

name.zh: 資訊視覺化設計與應用

description.zh: 本課程將介紹資訊視覺化設計與應用的原理與基礎。課程內容將包括:a)	資訊圖像及數位視覺的深入探討b)	利用電腦程式語言製作分析圖表、空間地圖及介面設計。c)	故事與應用主題的視覺化設計在本課程中，學生將學習如何有效的將資訊轉化為具視覺化美感的圖像，並從不同的案例分析中學會如何評估資訊視覺化設計作品與應用。
description.en: This course is an introduction to the principles and basic of infographic design and application. It consists of following issues:a)	The deep study of information graphics and digital visualizations.b)	The use of computer program language to create charts, maps and user interface.c)	The illustrations design to tell stories and application implementation. In this course, you will learn to create effective and beautiful graphical displays of evidence, and to critically evaluate examples from case studies.

name.en: Interactive Installation and Performing Arts Technology

description.zh: 本課程介紹整合即時影像、即時音訊、實體裝置、及相關表演科技（如燈光控制、各類感應器應用等）之技術與應用實務，並藉由圖形化、物件導向程式設計系統，引導未有程式設計經驗的視覺設計者或輔助已有程式設計能力者，以更有效率的方式進行相關互動系統設計，藉以達成互動裝置、表演科技、與表演藝術之整合。
description.en: This course introduces the technology that help integrates real-time video, audio, installations, and associated performance arts technology (such as lighting control, the application of various types of sensors, etc.) into performing arts. Through a graphical, object-oriented programming system, the course is intended to help visual designers with no programming experiences or to assist experienced programmers to efficiently design the interactive systems that combine interactive installations, performance arts technology, and performing arts itself as a whole.

notes: 日職合開/使用進修部教室/選課上限為30人

description.zh: 以圖像語言的架構教授分析性繪圖 (Analytical Drawing Process) 的概念與操作，以及分析性繪圖在設計速寫上的應用。課程以課堂講解與實地速寫來進行，主題包括感知與理解層面的三維觀察與紀錄、圖解、與圖像筆記。教學目標為：1.介紹分析性繪圖與徒手草寫。2.訓練以徒手草寫的過程來觀察、分析、與記錄結構、空間、與建成環境的三維特性。3.熟悉感知與理解的圖學系統與速寫表現手法，能以圖像筆記來記錄設計主題。
description.en: This course introduces the concept of analytical drawing process, and how to utilize it in design sketching.The objectives are:1.Introduce the concept of analytical drawing process and techniques of freehand sketch. 2.Develop the ability to see and analyze the three-dimensional characteristics of an observed object and encountered environment through analytical drawing process. 3.Familiar with both conceptual and perceptual form of representation, and be able to take a visual note to document an investigated subject.

notes: 互動所、外生班與職互動所合開/排光華館409室/英文授

name.en: Interactive Installation and Performing Arts Technology

description.zh: 本課程介紹整合即時影像、即時音訊、實體裝置、及相關表演科技（如燈光控制、各類感應器應用等）之技術與應用實務，並藉由圖形化、物件導向程式設計系統，引導未有程式設計經驗的視覺設計者或輔助已有程式設計能力者，以更有效率的方式進行相關互動系統設計，藉以達成互動裝置、表演科技、與表演藝術之整合。

Through a graphical, object-oriented programming system, the course is intended to help visual designers with no programming experiences or to assist experienced programmers to efficiently design the interactive systems that combine interactive installations, performance arts technology, and performing arts itself as a whole.

notes: 日職合開/使用進修部教室/選課上限為30人

name.en: Special selected topics on power electronics engineering are

description.zh: 電力電子相關領域專題講座
description.en: Special selected topics on power electronics engineering area

description.zh: 本課程之目標在於介紹使用者經驗設計之理論與研究方法。藉由本課程的學習，學生能習得互動設計過程中所需要之關鍵概念 - 以使用者經驗為中心之設計。課程以人-機-境之架構為基礎進行相關知識之講授，並透過相關研究案例之研討、方法之操作以及設計研究之進行了解其原理。課程內容包含人物誌、使用者經驗與需求、互動環境、使用者研究以及認知心理基礎等。教學將以課堂講授、文獻閱讀以及研究方法操作等方式進行，並以報告繳交、分組討論與發表為評量方式。
description.en: This course is focused on introducing the theories, application and research of User-Centered Design (UCD). In this course, students can understand the key element, UCD, of interactive design. This course is set up under the structure of Human-Machine-Scenario theory and case study. The contents include user experience and requirements, interactive scenario, usability design and evaluation, user-centered product design and development, design psychology and universal design. The course is preceded by means of lecturing, professional seminar and case study, and evaluated by students' reports, group discussion and presentation.

notes: 日職合開/使用進修部教室/選課上限為18人

description.zh: 本課程教導學生管理一項專案時，有關時間及成本的估計、進度表與預算的編列、以及其他監督控制一項專案進行之相關技巧與應用。專案計劃書的發展、專案投資的可行性分析、專案的風險評估、專案的介面管理，以及專案團隊與專案經理在一家公司組織內的地位和角色亦將加以討論。
description.en: This course teaches students the estimations of time and cost when managing a project, the development of project schedule and budget, and other relevant skills in monitoring and controlling the project. The development of project proposal, feasibility study of project investment, project risk assessment, project interface management, and the role of project manager in a project team within an organization will also be discussed.

description.zh: 本課程旨在讓學生學習如何做財務投資決策，使得商業或工業的投資專案得到最大投資效益或最經濟的成本，課程主題包含：投資環境的定義、投資專案評估方法、利率及通膨率、資產折舊、所得稅、專案現金流量分析、專案投資風險與不確定性、實質選擇權、商業及工業投資案例研討。本課程中將考量專案投資分析的各種影響因素，使得決策者可以更有效地做出投資決策。
description.en: The objective of this course is to teach students how to make smart financial decisions in an effort to create economical products. The subjects includes: the investment environment, investment project evaluation, interest rate and inflation rate, depreciation, income taxes, developing project cash flows, uncertainty and risk, real options, special topics of business and engineering decision. Various factors that affect the investment project decision problems are discussed to help decision maker properly resolves investment decision.

description.zh: 以演講，討論，口頭及書面報告方式，探討土木與防災之相關課題，如結構檢測評估與補強，水土防災技術，防災體系與資訊，都市防災，消防防災，施工災變，環境防災規劃與管理等。
description.en: By means of addresses discussion, oral presentations and reports to learn and investigate the related civil and disaster prevention subjects, such as structure testing, evaluation and repairing, soil and water disaster prevention, urban precaution, fire fighting, construction safety, environmental planning, and management for disaster prevention.

description.zh: 本課程係以營建工程專案管理之架構為核心目標，說明營建專案管理介紹，應用及方法論介紹，專案管理研究方法、透過營建管理重要課題，藉由工程實務經驗，使修課同學得以瞭解抽象的管理理念，而後能實際加以運用。內容範圍包含專案管理研究方法、品質管理，風險管理，價值工程，生產力分析，合約管理，糾紛與談判等營建工程專案管理等理論或實務內容。
description.en: 英課名：Construct engineering investigation research        General to say construct manage.        Schedule, capital, quality manage, risk manage,         value engineering, system method and theory.        Contract manage, arbitration, disagree handle,         coordinate and negotiations, etc.

description.zh: 本課程讓學生了解車輛省油不單純只是引擎燃燒性能或機構的改良而已，且另一個對車輛省油有重要貢獻的手段便是車輛的傳動系統技術的改良，此先進改良的方式增加學生對傳動系統重要性的認識。
description.en: This course introduces the concept of power train system, the relationship between engine and power train system, and the mechanical design of power train system. The purpose of this study is to increase the students' understanding in power train system.

description.zh: 以演講，討論，口頭及書面報告方式，探討土木與防災之相關課題，如結構檢測評估與補強，水土防災技術，防災體系與資訊，都市防災，消防防災，施工災變，環境防災規劃與管理等。
description.en: By means of addresses discussion, oral presentations and reports to learn and investigate the related civil and disaster prevention subjects, such as structure testing, evaluation and repairing, soil and water disaster prevention, urban precaution, fire fighting, construction safety, environmental planning, and management for disaster prevention.

description.zh: 企業運營管理要控制的主要目標是質量，成本，時間和靈活性，它們是在全球化的挑戰下，企業競爭力的根本。此課程探討服務業與製造業中，對於產品的關鍵生產和服務過程，從設計、監督與控制、流程與品質改善等議題，進而擴展到供應鏈中的存貨與物流。課程著重於理解生產與服務流程對於組織策略的角色，制定與評估相對應的效率指標，並進一步介紹相關議題可使用的分析工具。
description.en: This course is designed to address the key operations and logistical issues in service and manufacturing organizations that have strategic as well as tactical implications, which also serve as the core competitiveness in the global arena. It includes the introduction to the issues in designing, monitoring and controlling, efficiency and quality improving of the operations in an organization, and then expands to the entire supply chain. With class discussion and case study, the specific objectives include: to understand the role of operations management in the overall business strategy, to identify and evaluate the key factors in the design of effective operating systems, and to identify a range of tools appropriate for analysis of operating systems of the firm.

description.zh: 本課程藉由觀察並分析消費者的決策過程以及他們對各式產品所抱持之態度，來了解其消費行為。消費者為什麼又是如何作出他們最終的消費抉擇？在消費過程當中，他們的思考及行動是如何運作的？完成消費行為之後，他們是否對自己的決定感到滿意？在本課程中，多項與消費者行為息息相關之概念及主題將會一一於課堂中討論（如：感知及認知、人類行為、使用者經驗、人因工程、人本設計、制度規範、產品開發等等）。
description.en: This course will focus on the understanding of consumer behavior through consumers' decision-making processes as well as consumers' attitudes towards certain products. How and why do consumers make their consumption choices, how do they think and act during the processes, and do they feel satisfied or dissatisfied with their decisions? Various underlying concepts and topics will be discussed (e.g. perception and cognition, human behavior, user experience, ergonomics, human-centered design, policy and social norms, product development, etc.)

description.zh: 產品研發創新管理課程主要對象為有興趣從事企業產品研發創新發明機會或技能的學生們。此課程不僅介紹基礎發明工具而且提供課程上實際演練。主要內容包含如何辨識企業產品研發創新機會與問題；發現新點子；發展最適解答；展示創新成果與萃思方法介紹。課程上也會提出許多相關企業的應用實例討論。 其目的在於幫助學生們學習了解創新工具與系統創新方法在產品研發創新管理的專業領域及利用課程上的產品研發創新工具或取更好的工作機會
description.en: Production R&D Innovation Management course focuses on the particular interest to those students who are considering Production R&D development of an innovative business opportunity or innovation management skills. This course not only discusses the basics toolkits for every innovator needs, but also provides the practice workshop of systematic innovation. Major topics include how to identifying the opportunity and problem of Production R&D; discover the new ideas; develop the solution; demonstrate the innovation; and the TRIZ works. Many of the examples will also be discussed in their entrepreneurial approaches to Production R&D innovation. Objective: To develop an understanding of innovation toolkits and systematic innovation approach to help students making better understanding in Production R&D innovation management and equipping with the innovation skills needed to pursue a viable career option.

description.zh: 1.橋樑結構分析2.RC橋設計3.規範闡釋
description.en: Advanced Bridge Engineering 1.Analysis of Structures of Bridge2.Design of RC-Bridges3.Explanation of Specifications

description.zh: 科學視算指的是將大量的運算資料、監測結果或實驗數據，結合電腦繪圖以視覺化的方式呈現出來，幫助研究者進一步瞭解大量數據背後所代表的工程意義，在本課程中將介紹科學視算的原理，教導所使用的軟體工具和繪圖函式庫，讓學生有機會瞭解科學視算在土木工程上的應用，並以案例介紹科學視算的用途，如結構物的地震振動反應、震波在地層中的傳遞狀況、地形特徵和GPS資料的視覺化模擬、以及板塊運動的模擬情形等。本課程先修課程為程式設計，並且最好具備有限元素法的概念，建議研究所同學選修。
description.en: Scientific visualization is the use of computer graphics to visually represent the composite meaning of the large amount of data obtained by scientific computation, extensive monitoring, or engineering experiments. It could help researchers quickly grasp the engineering implications in their field of interest. This course will introduce the basic theory of scientific visualization, teach the relevant programming skills, and demonstrate how to apply the principles of scientific visualization to civil engineering problems. Examples include the seismic response of engineering structures, the propagation of seismic waves in the ground, and the movement of tectonic plates. The prerequisite of this course is computer programming. It is suitable for graduate students to choose as an elective.

description.zh: 認識坡地災害，包括全球性的原因與台灣地區特有的自然因素、人為因素及坡地災害現，進而討論坡地災害防治的原則及方法。1.坡地災害防治的重要性 2.坡地災害的全球性原因 3.台灣的削平速率與山坡地崩坍概況 4.台灣地區最脆弱的坡地 5.台灣地區坡地災害的自然動力 6.坡地災害的人為因素 7.坡地破壞之前兆 8.坡地災害防治一般性原則 9.坡地災害防治所必需的基本資料 10.坡地災害的防治與復育技術 11.坡地災害的緊急救治方法 12坡地災害個案分析
description.en: Slope calamity prevention  To understand slope -suffering, include global factors and specific nature factors, man-made factors and current slope-suffering in Taiwan to discuss the slope calamity prevention's method and principles. 1.the importance of slope calamity prevention2.the global factors of slope calamity prevention3.the cut velocity and slope slide overview4.the frailest slope in Taiwan5.the nature factor in Taiwan slope calamity 6.the man-made factor in slope calamity7.the omen of slope damage8.the general principles in slope calamity prevention9.essential basic information of slope calamity prevention10.slope calamity prevention and repair skill11.the emergency treatment in slope calamity prevention 12.slope calamity case analyses

description.zh: 本課程探討作業研究方法在營建工程之應用，課程內容包括作業方研究方法，施工作業研究，工期控制之作業研究，資源調配之作業研究，工期與成本控制之作業研究，施工材料之最佳管理，其他施工作業問題之研究。
description.en: operation's studyConstruction engineer and the study of operations. The study of the operation's method , construction , working phase, distribution the resources, working phase and cost control the best manage of construction making and other studies of working matters.

name.zh: 電腦在營建管理之應用
name.en: The Application of Computer in Construction Management

description.zh: 本課程主要自營建工程專案之觀點，介紹一些常用營建專案管理方法之基本原理及其在電腦上之應用實例。課程內容將包含營建專案之進度、成本、品質等基本管理概念與營建管理理論於專案管理之初步應用，使學生能實際地學習如何將電腦應用在營建工程專案管理(內容包括：工程排程、成本估算與控制、電腦模擬、與工程風險管理分析等方法)。
description.en: The application of computer in construction managementThe basic knowledge in computer, the basic design thought and current system practical training in Chinese-English word process system , the functional explain and application in EXCEL, the basic concept in information management system , the basic concept in engineer information management system , the design of database and database software system's practice, simple application in statistics drafting software and other current computer's technology development and other application in construction management.

description.zh: 妥善地利用資源可促使資源生生不息，不當地濫用卻會帶來大地反撲，禍及人類，如何在建設的同時,大興土木之際，顧及生態體系，及為本課程之主要重點。課程內容包括環境生態系統、生態學之基本法則、質能傳遞、污染物對生態之影響。
description.en: The main purpose of this course is to learn how to use the natural sources for industrial development but alse maintain the ecological balance. Improper usage of natural resourses will bring adverse results. The topic will include:fundamental ecology, mass and energy transfer and the impact of industrial development on ecology.

description.zh: 本課程將包含不可壓縮流體之特性探討、管流與明渠流之特性、邊界層理論、數值模擬與主要水工構造物之設計原理。
description.en: Fundamental properties of incompressible fluids; hydrostatics and fluid motion in closed conduits and open channels; potential flow; boundary layers; preliminary design of hydraulic structures; numerical analysis.

description.zh: 應用統計學之目的乃教導學生機率與統計的理論，其強調利用統計方法及資料分析之技巧，以解決工程上可能面臨的問題，因此本課程將大量引用真實資料及實例，以說明如何處理相關的問題。本課程的包含的內容將涵蓋資料分析、機率、隨機變數、機率分佈、推估、假設檢定、取樣、線性迴歸、機率過程、變異數分析及多變量分析。
description.en: This is a comprehensive course in probability and statistics for students in engineering and technology discipline.  It emphasizes modern statistical methods and data analysis using real data and examples to offer students exposure to practical applications.  This course will provide an opportunity to learn how probabilistic analysis and statistical reasoning and testing can be applied to a wide range of problems in civil engineering.  Topics to be covered will include data analysis, probability, random variables, probability distributions, estimation, hypothesis testing, sampling, linear regression, statistical process control and analysis of variance.

name.zh: 結構物檢測評估及補強

description.zh: 1.結構物劣化形態，介紹.2.目視檢測與非破性檢測。3.現況評估與分析。4.維修與補強設計。
description.en: 1.Reterioration types of concrete structures. 2.Visual an Non-estructive inspection. 3.Conition Evaluation and Analysis. 4.Maintenance and Repair Design.

description.zh: 知識管理是二十一世紀知識與學習型企業發展知識經濟最主要的技能，而營建與土木工程是一個需要專業知識的技術型產業，故亦應融入知識管理之理念。本課程基於上述理念，分別介紹營建興土木工程之相關專業技能，知識管理與企業e化發展技術，進而探討營建導入知識管理之技巧與方法。
description.en: Knowledge Management(KM) is the most important technique of learning type business for developing knowledge economy in the 21st century.Construction and civil engineering need to conduct knowledge management due to they are complex and full with professional techniques.This course will introduce related professional techniques of construction and civil engineering,the development technology of knowledge management and a e business,also will illustrate the conducting methods of construction knowledge management.

description.zh: 建築耗能佔有國家整體能源極大之比例，對於社會、經濟及環境等議題具有相當重要之影響。因此，提升建築能源使用效率、降低成本和環境保護之設計要求，對於專業的建築環境控制工程師以及建築師而言，實為責無旁貸之責任與挑戰。本課程將講授建築設計規劃與空調系統、照明系統、動力系統、建築能源管理系統等環境控制設備之整合節能設計學理、建築節能模擬與分析、以及相關國內外建築節能標準之應用與設計內涵。學生將藉由課堂授課、資料閱讀、討論及專題模擬分析過程中，學習並養成建築節能之創新設計與技術應用。
description.en: Buildings are significant users of energy in a society and their energy consumption has important implications to social, economic and environmental issues.  A challenging task of building professional engineers and architects today is to design and promtote energy efficient buildings in a cost effective and environmentally responsive way.  This course is intended to introduce the energy efficent technologies of building environmental control systems in the sense of integrated planning, and explain the common methods for building energy anaylysis and building energy efficiency standards.  This course presents the concept of architecture design and planning, optimization of HVAC systems, and technology needed to integrated the heating, cooling, natural ventilation, lighting, electricity, and building energy management systems into building's strutre and design.  Students will study the topics through lectures, readings, discussions, and project analysis.  It is hoped that the knowledg

description.zh: 本課程之目的為訓練學生計算冷凍空調設備之蒸發器、冷凝器之熱傳與壓損的能力，以提升冷凍空調設備之設計能力。內容包括兩相流之流譜分析與動量方程式、兩相介面之表面張力作用、熱沸騰與冷凝等相變化之基本現象、兩相流之沸騰與冷凝熱傳性能之計算與分析、兩相流之流力現象分析與壓損之計算、蒸發器與冷凝器之熱傳增強技術等。
description.en: This course offers traning of advanced design techniques of evaporators and condensers in the HVAC & R applications.  The subjects in this course are: the two phase flow regime, analysis of momentum and energy equations for two phase flow, method of prediction of pressure drop of two phase flow, fundamental phenomena of condensation and evaporation, calculation of heat transfer coefficient of convective condensation or evaporation, heat transfer enhancement techniques for condensation and evaporation.

description.zh: 本課程內容有:1.儀器裝置,應變計原理與使用方法.2.驗証簡支樑之彎曲理論.3.驗證馬克斯維爾反相定理.4.桁架試驗.5.剛架試驗.6.壓構材欴挫屈試驗.7.構材扭轉試驗.
description.en: Introduction: 1.Instrumentation. 2.Simple bending. 3.Maxwell's Reciprocal theorem. 4.Truss. 5.Rigid frame. 6.Buckling test. 7.Torsion test.

description.zh: 實驗是進行科學與工程研究不可或缺的工具，實驗方法的設計與實驗數據的分析更是決定實驗結果品質優劣的關鍵，本課程將介紹實驗過程所必須具備的各項知識，以數據的量測與分析為開始，並介紹量測各類物理量的感測元件，如壓力、溫度、流量及聲波等，以建立學生具備實驗量測的基礎。課程主要內容包含有基本量測、量測標準、量測單位、訊號讀取、資料簡報、數據的準確性與變異性、類比訊號量測、數位訊號量測、系統響應、感測器。
description.en: Introduction of Experiment and Measurement MethodExperiment is the essential tool for the research of science and engineering. The design of experiment and the analysis of data are the keys of the high quality of experiment. The course will introduce the materials of experiment and measurement. The procedures of measurement and the analysis method of data will be detailed investigated. And then the sensors to measure the interested physical parameters of pressure, temperature, flow rate and acoustic will be introduced. The technology of measurement and analysis of experiment will be built up in the course. The contents of the course are basic measurement, standards of measurement, dimension of measurement, access data, data presentation, accuracy and uncertainty of data, analog signal measurement, digital signal measurement, system response, and sensors.

description.zh: 現代能源工程技術，決定製程成本，故如何統合有效率的能源管理技術是決定產品競爭力之關鍵，本課程主要內容為︰1. 能源成本控制2. 區域型電力能管理策略3. 能源系統的經濟性設計概念4. 冷暖系統的檢測與分析5. 總合能源操作的工程化資料收集6. 新能源系統的生態模組化設計
description.en: At the completion of this course, students will be able to several factors:1. Compare and contrast the various forms of energy conversion.2. Examine the technologies used to convert chemical energy into mechanical energy.3. Apply the concepts of electrical converters.4. Evaluate the major types of energy storage.5. Determine how human values affect the success of energy conservation.6. Design of new energy system modules with ecology considerations.

description.zh: 本課程介紹系統工程，系統工程專注於處理大型、複雜的專案發展時，所面臨的相關工程發展程序與問題，如何從計畫任務成型、系統設計、實體產出、整合測試、品質保證、系統操作、後勤支援、任務操作與結束等全程的一門跨多學科領域的管理與工程科學。本課程簡介系統工程重要議題，並以典型衛星系統研發作為本課程之應用範例。課程內容包括: 系統基本概念、系統工程基本概念、任務分析、系統需求、功能分析與配置、設計整合、產品獲取(或發展)與系統驗證、品質保證、系統管控、系統工程的實施、衛星系統工程實務。
description.en: The course will introduce systems engineering. Systems engineering normally emphasizes handling the engineering process and problems in the development of large and complicated projects/programs. It involves how the project/ program mission formed, system design, hardware/software components produced, integration and testing, quality assurance, system operations, logistics, mission operations until its decommission. It involves various interdisciplinary sciences and management skill for the engineering knowledge and skill to meet the needs for mission success.  This course will provide the introduction on the systems engineering and provide the typical satellites (mission) systems research and development as the examples for better understanding its wide applications. The courses may cover: fundamental concept of system and systems engineering, mission analysis, system requirements, functional analysis and allocations, design and integration, products procurement/ development and syste

Design principles of AC electric machines6. Finite element analysis of AC electric machines 7. Mechanical design of AC electric machines

name.en: Principles and Practices of  Cloud Computing

description.zh: 課程介紹雲端資訊計算與運用相關技術，使學生對雲端平台、架構、服務有全面性瞭解。課程內容包括： 1.雲端運算發展近況及基本概念2.資源虛擬化之基本概念與技術，3.雲端運算相關技術、效能與安全，4.虛擬化資料中心建置-虛擬計算、儲存、網路與應用，6.雲端服務規劃，7.雲端之基礎設施服務、平台服務、軟體服務介紹，8.專題討論。
description.en: Cloud Computing, either private, public or hybrid, is dramatically transforming every aspect of IT. Now it has become ubiquitous these days, and is the key foundation for developing technologies of Big Data and Internet of Things (IoT). Its deployment starts delivering applications with more benefits than the existing legacy infrastructure.Because the terms are broadly quoted and adopted, then by this course, the Cloud Computing core technologies and the associated below will be well introduced:1.Cloud Computing Basic Concept 2.Resources Virtualization & Software Defined Data Center (SDDC)3.Cloud Computing Security 4.Cloud Technologies5.Cloud Service Planning and Deployment 6.Infrastructure as a Service (IaaS)7.Platform as a Service (PaaS)8.Software as a Services (SaaS)9.Cloud Service Operations 10.Case Studies and presentation

description.zh: 本課程旨在介紹供應鏈管理中之相關問題及議題 。其中包含產業分析、e化概念、需求及供應管理、長鞭效應、存貨管理、延遲理論、及供應鏈管理實務。
description.en: The purpose of the course is to offer student a sound introduction of supply chain management relative issues. It includes industry analysis, E-business concept, demand and supply management, bullwhip effect, inventory management, postponement, and supply chain management practice.

description.zh: 由於網路的發展迅速，電子商務已經是必然的趨勢。本課程中介紹經營電子商務所需的各種重點技巧，包括產品規劃，通路規劃，商業網站設計、行銷網站建置與管理、網路行銷工具、行銷資訊系統、Google管理工具的應用、關鍵字廣告、商業部落格、電子郵件與會員電子報廣告管理，網路行銷企劃案實務等重要議題，讓同學對經營電子商務有一個整體的了解。

notes: 工管大三大四與工管所合開/課堂課：科研442室

description.zh: 組織行為是採用分析的方法，了解研究解個體行為在個人、團體、組織三個層次中的行為表現，並應用相關學理知識提高組織效能，尤其將焦點放在如何提高員工的生產力、降低離職率與曠職率，增加滿意度等四個變項上。
description.en: Organizational behavior (OB) is a field of research that investigates the impact that individuals, groups, and structure have on behavior within an organization, and then it applies that knowledge to make organizations work more effectively.  Specifically, OB focuses on how to improve productivity, reduce absenteeism and turnover, and increase employee citizenship and job satisfaction.

description.zh: 1. 傅利葉分析與訊號取樣，2. 離散時序系統之頻率響應與電路設計， 3. Infinite Impulse Response 數位濾波器設計：Bilinear 轉換式，Impulse-invariance 方式， Step-invariance 方式，高通、帶通、帶拒濾波器轉換式，4.Finite Impulse Response 數位濾波器設計：Fourier Series 方法，Window 方法，5. 離散與快速傅利葉轉換：DFT、FFT等演算法。
description.en: 1.Fourier analysis and signal sampling 2.Frequcy response of discrete time system 3.IIR digital filter design 4.FIR digital filter design 5.Discrete Fourier transform 6.Fast Fourier transform

notes: 四資四、資工所和電資國際班合開

description.zh: 認識科技文章及科技學術論文語法、文體、結構組織等特質，並探討技術報告及論文撰寫方式。
description.en: This course helps the learners recognize the syntax, style, and organization as far as the papers on technology and technical writings are concerned. Discussions include specific ways to technical presentation and technical writings.

description.zh: 本課程將介紹模糊邏輯、模糊推論、模糊控制及其應用。滑動模式控制、適應性控制、最佳控制、基因演算法及其相關智慧型控制方法之設計及應用也將在此課程中被探討。此外，藉由一些物理及工程的系統以驗證課程中所介紹之智慧型控制法方之可行性及有效性。
description.en: In this course, fuzzy logic, fuzzy inference, fuzzy control and its application will be introduced. In addition, sliding mode control, adaptive control, genetic algorithm and optimal control will also be explored in this course. Moreover, some engineering and physical models are used to show the feasibility and validity of these intelligent control methods.

description.zh: 簡介,層狀認知網路,倒傳遞網路,學習向量量化網路,自組織映射網路,Hopfisld網路，退火神經網路,應用與實做。
description.en: introduction, layer perceptron, back-propagation network, learning vector qvantization, self-organizing map, hpfield neural network ,annealed neuralnetwork, applications implements.

name.en: Research Topics in Smart Living Technologies

description.zh: 本課程主要探討本課程主要探討智慧生活科技相關議題。這是一門整合不同領域的新興課程，透過最新論文的閱讀與研討，學習智慧生活科技。
description.en: The goal of the course is to provide students with topics related to smart living technologies. In this course, we will take an interdisciplinary look at smart living topics and ubiquitous computing by reading and discussing recent literature.

description.zh: 本課程以講授工業用計算機網路中實體層、媒體存取控制與邏輯連結層為主。在實體層中，將討論到目前廣泛於工業上使用的實體媒介。在媒體存取控制上，則討論乙太網路，記號匯流排與記號環網路為主。媒體存取控制也包含目前廣泛於各類控制器上使用的控制區域網路 (CAN Bus)。在邏輯連結層上，主要討論路由器使用的路由協定與路由演算法。
description.en: The main subjects of this course include physical layer, media access control and logic link layer. Popular physical layer medium are discussed first. Media access control sub-layer that includes Ether-Net, Token Bus and Token Ring are the main subjects in the second portion. The contents of the media access control also include CAN bus which is widely used in various controllers. Routing protocol used by routers are discussed in third portion of this course.

description.zh: 介紹VBA 語言基本資料處理的概念，包含基本輸入與輸出、程式的流程控制、函數的應用等指令之撰寫、程式之編輯、編譯、聯絡與程式之執行，並發展一套應用程式。
description.en: This course introduces the basic data processes of EXCEL VBA language. They include input/output, program process control, application of functions, program editing and execution, and so on.

notes: 科研735電腦教室 IMBA & IMFI

description.zh: 先修課程：光學。 本課程介紹各種光學方法用以量測位移及角度之變化量，光學訊號是透過光電感測器轉換為電子訊號以便進行分析，其內容含：1.簡介 2.光學尺 3.干涉儀 4.幾何誤差 5.幾何光學尺 6.雷射光學尺 7.雙頻干涉儀
description.en: This course introduces the optical methods used to determine the displacements and angular rotations of a target. Optical signals are transferred into electronic signals for analysis. It involves：1.Introduction 2.Geometrical error 3.Laser encoder 4.Interferometers 5.Optical encoder 6.Optical

name.zh: 高科技產業專利佈局與專利策略
name.en: Patent Strategy and Patent Portfolio of High Technology Industry

description.zh: 高科技產業的專利攻防已變成產業策略之一，越來越多的訴訟案件逼使廠商進行專利迴避設計。事實上台灣的產業界對於迴避設計、專利策略與專利佈局理論上並不陌生，但在實務上卻很少實際執行，所以每年仍然付出數十億美金的權利金。本課程將從專利申請策略開始，告訴同學專利申請上常見的錯誤，如何以較低的成本取得、維護我國專利，並利用我國專利進行全球專利佈局。
description.en: Patent litigation, either initiation or defense, has become one of the high-tech industrial strategies, and more and more patent suit cases have forced the manufacturers to undertake patent design around. In fact, the industrial fields in Taiwan, theoretically, do not feel strange on design around and patent strategies. However, in practice, they perform much less. That is the reason why Taiwan still has to pay more than five billion US dollars each year for royalty. This course will start from patent filing strategy, getting patent claims well known, then following with introduction on orientation of patent strategies, and providing theory and practice on patent strategies. The outline of this course is given as follows: Patent claim interpretation; Process of patent infringement analysis; Requirements of patent design around; Patent strategy analysis; Practice on patent strategies; and Study on patent cases.

notes: 光電四、光電所與智財所合開

description.zh: 數據資料獲得，主要是依據3S(GPS、GIS、RS)，整合地理資訊系統(GIS)、遙感探測(RS)、以及地面或無人航空載具等多尺度遙感探測之發展，三類資料的綜整為重要的學習議題。地物在時間及空間分佈之規律性，則可以在分佈潛勢地區，判釋分析。空間資料之建立成果，後續除了展示圖與視覺化分析之外，更應進一步進行空間統計、空間層級、空間分布型態、空間自相關、空間關係與模式等相關技術之研究與發展。
description.en: Big data acquisition in environmental space information is mainly based on 3S (GPS, GIS, RS), and the development of multi-scale remote sensing such as ground or unmanned aerial vehicle, i.e. a drone. The consolidation of the different types of data is an important learning issue. The regularity of the distribution of land features in time/space can be interpreted and analyzed by areas/(sequences) of potential distribution. In addition to the display of maps and visualization analysis, the subsequent establishments of spatial data (and relationships among) should further studied with spatial statistics, spatial hierarchy, spatial distribution patterns, spatial inter-correlation, spatial relationships and patterns, and other related technologies.

notes: 互動所與設計博所合開/排設計館701室/上限為10人

name.zh: 創新講座-創意與創新思維(一)

description.zh: 本課程經由邀請產官學界專家蒞校進行講座課程演講及論壇之方式，進行創意與創新思維之實例教學，使學生能儘早瞭解企業創新之模式及相關理論，以啟發學生之創意，促進學術與產業之互動與交流，縮短產學距離。
description.en: This course conducts the instances teaching of creativity and innovate thinking by invite industry, government and academic experts to give lectures and forums. The mine objective is to enable students to understand about the innovation model and related theories of enterprises as soon as possible, and to inspire students’ creativity. Furthermore, promote interaction between academic and industry; and to shorten the distance between academic and industry.

notes: 共同演講廳；工設四與創新所合開

description.zh: 科技始終來自於人性，不論是家具、室內或產品設計目的都是服務人群，因而應該以人為中心來考量生活形態、人因、心理認知、文化等層面對設計的影響。本課程旨在闡明此一理念，課程包括：以使用者為中心的設計方法及步驟，並輔以實例說明及個案研討。
description.en: "Technology always comes from humanity."  The purpose of interior, furniture or product is to serve people.  Therefore, their design should reflect the user's life style, human factors, mental cognitions and cultural differences.  This course aims to explore human-centered design.  First, the definition and significance of human-centered design will be discussed.  The methods and procedures of human-centered design in the field of design will also be studied.  Finally, some examples and case studies will be explored.

description.zh: 公共生活環境中存在許多設計上的問題．本課程藉由觀察記錄等研究方法訓練，幫助同學釐清問題核心，並針對公共環境中的產品進行設計提案，滿足不特定多數人的需求．
description.en: There are many design problems in public environment. This course “Public Design” are implemented by teaching observation methods training, to help students clarify the core of the problem, and proposal Design for the public environment eventually. Making all public design meet the specific needs of the majority of users.

description.zh: 本課程旨在介紹研究快速原型之原理與方法，並藉設計實例演練，以達熟悉研究快速原型之操作與功能。
description.en: To introduce and study the principle and method of rapid prototype.  By the design project practice, to be adept at the operation and function of rapid prototype.

description.zh: 21世紀的工業設計師已不能再靜待市場研究及產品企劃人員提供產品設計規範，而應以使用者代言人、及企業產品開發整合者身分，主動參與產品策略與企劃，並以視覺化技術協助相關人員作橫向溝通。因此，「產品創新設計策略與企劃」課程主要目標在教導學生以「前瞻性的視野」，透過創新設計的步驟與方法，策劃出符合企業技術及經營體質，並且能滿足市場及使用者使用情況需求的產品。本課程將以理論、方法、案例研討及個案研究方式進行。
description.en: The function of industrial design in the 21st  century, will no longer waiting for the product definition from the marketing and product planning, It will become a integrator and visualizer during the product innovation strategic phase, and concerning to the user's needs.          	Product Innovation Strategy will guide the enterprise looking beyond their current operation to match their technologies and the distinct competencies with emerging the user and the market needs.The contents of this topic will include theory, methodology, and practical case study.

notes: 一教101；工設三四與日職創新所合開

description.zh: 每週以專業領域的教授及學術研討方式進行，透過實戰演練的方式，提升學生具競爭力之學術研究能量，期達到鼓勵學術與經驗傳承之目的。除了課堂講授與之外，本課程在學期中希望同學運用到簡報的能力，已期望能進一步提升學生學習成效。
description.en: Each week, the professors and academic seminars are conducted. Experts and scholars in the field of finance are invited to exchange guidance and to enhance the academic research energy of students with a competitive ability. The purpose of encouraging academic and empirical transmission is achieved. Besides lectures, the professor will teach methods that may be used during the semester in order to enhance student learning effectiveness, such as PowerPoint.

name.en: Design and Analysis of Computer Algorithms

description.zh: 1. 數學基礎 1.1 函數成長率之漸近性質 1.2 遞迴關係之解        1.3 數學歸納法 2. 基本分析技巧 2.1 計算複雜度之上下限2.2 最差情況分析及平均情況分析 2.3 動態平均分析 3. 基本設計技巧 3.1 分擊法 3.2 貪婪法 3.3 動態規劃 3.4 隨機演算法 4. 計算複雜度 4.1 資訊理論證明法 4.2 對抗式證明法 4.3 問題之線性轉換 4.4 完全NP
description.en: 1. Mathematical background 1.1 Asymptotic growth rate of functions 1.2 Solving recurrence relations 1.3 Mathematical induction 2. Basic analysis techniques 2.1 Computational complexities -- lower bounds and upper bounds 2.2 Worst case analysis and average case analysis 2.3 Amortized analysis 3. Basic Design Paradigms 3.1 Divide and conquer 3.2 Greedy methods 3.3 Dynamic programming 3.4 Probabilistic algorithms 4. Computational Complexity 4.1 Information-theoretic arguments 4.2 Adversary arguments 4.3 Linear reduction of problems 4.4 NP-completeness

name.zh: 數位化設計專案研究(二)

description.zh: 數位化設計專案包含研究與設計。設計專案透過工業設計的理論、方法及程序，以研究的手段形成設計決策，或以實證的方式將研究成果應用於設計實務。設計專案之設計成果必須建立在相關的研究基礎上。
description.en: This course is directed toward an approved digitized design project withresearch and design completed under supervision of the director. Theory andpractice in research and development dealing with the design project isreviewed in the study. Projects must represent a meaningful contribution tothe field of design base on supportive research.

description.zh: 設計相關專題，以文獻研讀，邀請專家專題演講，及論文討論為重點，參與者透過密集討論、書面報告、或舉行口頭發表等方式，可以有效率地交換意見，獲得更深入而廣泛的認識。
description.en: Topical studies in history, theory, and criticism of design. Under the above goals, inviting addresses for special topics will be arranged though the courses. The Participants are encouraged to have intensive discussion, written reports, or further oral presentation. Efficient opinion exchange would be also expected to derive more extensive interest.

description.zh: 認知記號, 產品語意, 生活環境相關課題, 以科技整合, 人因互動,研究方法為重點, 以跨領域整合, 國際合作, 模擬驗證為特色之設計。
description.en: This course provides study of ergonomical design related topics on Cognitive Semiotics and Product Semantics. With emphasis on technology integration, ergonomics proactive and methodology, the course will be characterized by inter-disciplinary and international cooperation and simulation verification.

description.zh: 認知記號, 產品語意, 生活環境相關課題, 以科技整合, 人因互動,研究方法為重點, 以跨領域整合, 國際合作, 模擬驗證為特色之設計。
