With emphasis on technology integration, ergonomics proactive and methodology, the course will be characterized by inter-disciplinary and international cooperation and simulation verification.

name.zh: 嵌入式智慧影像分析與實境界面
name.en: Embedded Computing Systems for Intelligent Image Analytics and Interactive Systems

description.zh: 本課程主要內容為：1.嵌入式智慧計算系統、2.嵌入式影像處理技術、3.影像辨識技術、4.人工智慧辨識技術、5.實境互動界面技術，並整合實務議題之專案開發。
description.en: The course contents include: 1. Embedded Computing Systems; 2. Embedded image processing techniques; 3. Image recognition techniques; 4. Artificial intelligence techniques for image analytics; 5. AR-based interactive systems; 6. Practical Projects

name.en: Syntax: Theory and Application in English Teaching

description.zh: 本課程的目的是複習英語的句子結構，以獲得對語法形式更深層的瞭解，包含各種描述性或理論性的分析方法。藉著採用不同英語教學方法，這種瞭解與知識有助於解答在英語教學上所遭遇的各種學習歷程的問題，尤其是寫作和翻譯的學習過程中。
description.en: This course reviews the sentence structures in English for a deeper understanding of grammatical constructions, including various descriptive and theoretical approaches to representing them. By applying various English teaching methods, such knowledge can be helpful in dealing with problems that are frequently encountered when carrying out various learning activities in the classroom, especially essay writing and translation activities.

name.en: Special Topics in Molecular Cell Biology

description.zh: 本課程討論細胞培養與基因工程技術之原理與應用，課程內容包涵下列主題：(1) 微生物、植物、昆蟲及動物細胞之特性 (2)細胞於生物反應器的培養，包括各式生物反應器介紹、生物反應器動力學、生物反應器之操作與控制 (3)基因重組蛋白之表現，將包涵不同的細胞載体表現系統 (4)實例探討，如單株抗體、生物高分子材料、基因治療載体等之生產。
description.en: This course discusses the principle and applications of cell culture and molecular biology.  The course covers the following topics: (1) characteristics of microbial, plant, insect, and mammalian cells; (2) cell culture in bioreactors, including descriptions of bioreactor types, operation modes, bioreactor kinetics, and instrumentation and control; (3) expression of foreign genes in various cell systems; (4) case studies, such as production of monoclonal antibody, biopolymers, and gene therapy vectors.

name.zh: 半導體材料檢測技術及原理

description.zh: 本課程將探討半導體材料之表面化學性質之分析技巧、以及界面和分子間引力之量測方法、表面形態分析、晶相結構分析以及電磁性質量測之技術和其原理。並配合半導體旋轉塗佈機和濺鍍機所備製之薄膜﹐實際操作FTIR顯微鏡、原子力顯微鏡、微量材料流變儀。
description.en: This course will present the techniques and their corresponding theories on the surface property measurements including chemical information, stress analysis, morphology, crystalline structure and intermolecular forces between interfaces. The course also includes a practical training on the FTIR microscope, atomic force microscope, reology meter on the semiconductor materials.

name.zh: 綠色化學與潔淨技術特論
name.en: Special Topics on Green Chemistry and Clean Technology

description.zh: 目前永續發展已被視為推動社會和諧、經濟發展和環境保護的共同目標，化學科技則居中扮演一個非常關鍵的角色，因此，這門課程的主要目的是介紹綠色化學與潔淨技術的設計、開發和評估，其中包括：非傳統原料的利用、有利於生態的合成方法、設計更安全的化工產品以及生物合成和生物模擬原理的使用，並從原材料的選擇以至終端產物之整個生產流程，做一完整的評估以了解對人員安全健康以及生態的影響，並與對應的傳統製程相互比較。
description.en: Sustainable development is now accepted as a necessary goal for achieving societal, economic and environmental objectives. Within this chemistry has a vital role to play. Therefore, this course aims to introduce the students to the design, development, and evaluation processes of new Green Chemistry methodologies, and it include: alternative feedstocks, environmentally benign synthetic methodologies, designing safer chemical products, new reaction conditions, alternative solvents and catalyst development, and the use of biosynthesis and biomimetic principles. The students are introduced to the new evaluation process that encompasses the health and environmental impact of a synthetic pathway from choice of starting materials through to target molecule. Furthermore, comparisons and contrasts with classical methodologies are offered as illustrative examples in this course, too.

description.zh: 「創意商」是指一個人在創意能力上的指數。本課程至少包括下述和「創意商」相關的課題：它的科學基礎，它的心理學方法，它的知識論基礎，如何培養創意的基因，如何區別個人的與在團體中所展現的創意，等等。本課程將進行系列的西方創意理論與個案探討，目的在使學習者得以培養他們的「創意商」。
description.en: “Creativity Quotient” refers to the quotient one has for her ability of creativity. The course covers at least the following topics relevant to “Creativity Quotient”: its scientific basis, its psychological methods, its epistemic foundation, the development of the gene of creativity, the difference between individual creativity and creativity in a group, etc. The course will proceed with a series of close surveys of western theories and accounts of creativity and practical cases, so that the participants of the course will cultivate their “creativity quotient. ”

description.zh: 課程專為欲深度瞭解英文文學史的中學教師與研究所學生而設計。課程將引領學生研讀17世紀至今的英國文學文本，種類包含詩、戲劇、小說與自傳。學生需利用課內與課外的時間研讀文本，以利學生跳脫其熟悉之課程框架，於實務教學思維上有所創新發想。本課程之評分將以實際的教學示範、短篇寫作作業，以及學生參與程度為主要標準，論文報告次之。
description.en: This course is designed for the high school teacher and for any graduate student who wants a thorough background in the history of English literature. Students will read British literary texts from the seventh century to the present in the genres of poetry, drama, fiction, and autobiography. Some texts will be read outside of class; others will be read/acted in class, allowing students to come away with practical teaching ideas for their own classes. This course, instead of culminating in a major seminar paper, is graded based on sample teaching demonstrations, shorter writing assignments, and student participation.

description.zh: 本課程之目的在訓練學生，使學生熟悉統計方法與理論，能利用已知之資料整理、介紹各種實驗之配置法。課程內容包括：機率理論、假設檢定、變異數分析、一因子實驗、多因子實驗等。
description.en: The purpose of this course is to train student and to provide a background in the theory and Introduce the experiment design methods. Topics include probability theory, hypothesis testing, regression analysis and variance analysis. one factor experiment, Multi factors experiment.

name.zh: 工業工程與管理專題研討(一)

description.zh: 本課程主要透過論文報告、團體討論、演講等活動，使學生熟悉特定研究領域相關之工程技術及應用。
description.en: This course mainly aims to familiarize students with engineering techniques and applications related to specific research field through activities such as research reports, group discussions, and speeches.

name.zh: 工業工程與管理專題研討(二)

description.zh: 本課程主要透過論文報告、團體討論、演講等活動，使學生熟悉特定研究領域相關之工程技術及應用。
description.en: This course mainly aims to familiarize students with engineering techniques and applications related to specific research field through activities such as research reports, group discussions, and speeches.

description.zh: 本課程主要是讓同學學習顯示面板相關的理論與瞭解先關產業動向；除了透過產業導師的教導與實地工廠的見習，讓同學在最短的時間內對現今顯示面板產業有初步的認識；此外，本課程內容也包含各種液晶原件的製作與相關光電特性的量測與應用，藉此訓練修課同學能成為顯示面板的初階人才。
description.en: The course will introduce the principle of display panel and let students to know the industry dynamics. The students can get preliminary knowledge of the display panel industry with less time by the teaching from industrial mentor and the practice at factory.  In addition, the students will also learn how to produce various LC devices and measure the electro-optical properties or practically apply of these produce devices.  Thus, the students will become a junior talent of display panel market after training of this course.

notes: 光電四與光電所合開，部份上課彈性調整為全日上課

description.zh: 本科目以跨學科多媒體的方式來探討不同媒介(與文類)的作品之間如何存在著啟發創意的連鎖反應，與創意激盪的引力關係，並探索何以同一時代不同的藝術形式之間展現出類似的創意主題與手法，進而形成時代的文化特色。以荷蘭畫家維米爾(Vermeer)的名畫「戴珍珠耳環的少女」為例，此畫作激發了作家歇維理(Chevalier)無限的想像空間而寫了一部同名小說，試圖去解釋畫作背後之奧秘。接著，受小說的激發，一部同名電影應運而生，把小說情節加以改編，並參考維米爾其它畫作, 試圖重現原畫創作時畫家個人、家庭與時代風采。這一連串連鎖激盪之下，不同媒介與文類的新作品出爐了，各有特色，而且彼此間還有相互連結和彼此評論的關係。有時候，類似的連結(可能在主題或手法上)普遍地出現在同一時代不同的藝術形式之間，這說明了此一連鎖與創意激盪的關係如何大規模地造成文化思想潮流與大眾流行文化。以「解構(後結構)思潮」為例，原本在哲學領域獨樹一格，進入文學批評理論領域後成為顯學，進而影響藝術評論與創作理念。後來更傳播至建築理論與設計，造成「解構建築」之流行與歪斜屋宇之誕生。儼然成為「後現代文化」的註冊商標。這一文化傳播的現象乃依賴前述之(1)啟發創意的連鎖反應，
description.en: This course adopts an interdisciplinary and inter-medium approach to understanding the cultural creation of a text.  The target is to investigate how a cultural/literary text is created in relation to, and in response to, another text in different media/genres, and how this "chain reaction" or "web of influences" displays a rippling effect that travels across the boundaries among painting, music, architecture, literature, and film.  For example, Vermeer's painting entitled "The Girl with a Pearl Earring" inspires the creation of a novel by Tracy Chevalier, which in turn facilitates the creation of a movie also with the same title. The case is the same with the musical piece of "Gloomy Sunday" which inspires the creation of many verbal/visual/audio art forms under the same title and even makes a social impact on increasing suicide cases.  These related texts form a "constellation" of "cycle," and certain ideas are so powerful that they permeate many genres/media at the same period of ti

description.zh: 超快雷射由於其脈衝寬度在皮秒(10-12)之下，它在軍事科技、工業應用、生醫檢測與學術研究所扮演的角色日益重要，本課程將介紹超短脈衝雷射的種類，尤其著重在光纖短脈衝雷產生的原理、脈衝壓縮的技術與超短脈衝寬度與相位量測的技術，此外也將介紹超快雷射的各種應用包括光譜量測、泵-探量測與非線性光學量測等技術。
description.en: Due to relative short pulse below one picosecond, ultrafast lasers have been widely used in various fields including military, industry, biomedical diagnosis and scientific research.  In this course, it will introduce various kinds of the ultrafast lases, especially on the principle of mode-locked fiber generation, pulse compression technique and the method of the ultrashort pulsewidth measurement as well as phase retrieval.  Various applications of ultrafast laser including fluorescence, pump-probe and nonlinear optical measurement have also been introduced in this course.

description.zh: 機械振動、非線性振動、振動量測、振動抑制及隔離技術、振動與波之傳播、聲音之反射及折射、噪音之降低及吸音材料、消音器與噪音控制、法規及環境等。
description.en: Topics include: Mechanical vibration, Vibration  transmission, Vibration measurement, The use of vibration isolators and absorbers, Fundamentals of acoustics, Noise control engineering, Instrumentation and Law.

notes: 機電所與機械自動外生班合開

description.zh: 控制理論及應用簡介、線性空間及線性運算子、線性動態方程式及反應、可控制性可觀測性及穩定性、狀態回授及狀態預估、多變數I/O控制器設計及應用。
description.en: Introduction, Linear spaces and linear operators, linear dynamic equations, controllability, observability, stability analysis, state feedback and state prediction, multi-input multi-output systems, controller design and application.

description.zh: 本課程介紹用以發展與分析三維空間多體運動學與動力學的觀念, 定義, 與技巧. 主要課題包括計算動力學簡介, 剛體運動學, 動態方程的構成, 侷限動力學與空間動力學等.
description.en: This course introduces the concepts, definitions, and techniques used for developing and analyzing kinematics and dynamics of multibody in three dimensions. The main topics include introduction of computational dynamics, kinematics of rigid bodies, forms of the dynamic equations, constrained dynamics and spatial dynamics. ematics and dynamics of multibody in three dimensions. The main topics include introduction of computational dynamics, kinematics of rigid bodies, forms of the dynamic equations, constrained dynamics and spatial dynamics.

notes: 綜科327 限24人 限機電學院

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意介紹雷射加工之理論及實務，注重製程參數之研究，教導學生如何掌握製程，以達到精密製造的要求。內容包括雷射輔助製造程序、雷射加工設備、雷射加工原理、系統分析、實驗設計、雷射加工實例。
description.en: Introducing theory and practice of laser material processing. Emphasizing the study of manufacturing factors. Letting the students know how to control manufacturing process, and fulfill the demand of precision manufacturing. The course content is : laser assisted manufacturing processes, facilities for laser material processing, the principles of laser material processing, system analysis, examples of laser material processing.

description.zh: 先修課程:負責教授同意.類神經網路介紹: 演算法,應用,與程式技巧，類神經網路控制器設計與模擬，模糊集合,近似推理理論,模糊邏輯控制器介紹，模糊邏輯控制器設計與模擬，基因演算法介紹，以基因演算法最佳化控制器，智慧型控制應用。
description.en: 1.Introduction to neural network: algorithms, applications, programming techniques. 2. Design and simulation of neural network controller3. Introduction to fuzzy set, approximate reasoning, fuzzy logic controller4. Design and simulation of fuzzy logic controller5. Introduction to genetic algorithm6. Optimization of controller by genetic algorithm7. Applications of intelligent controller

description.zh: 機械手臂基礎理論，內容包含座標轉換、機械臂運動學、反運動學、動力學、軌跡規畫、機械臂設計、機械臂控制、機械臂的程式語言等。
description.en: It is a fundamental course concerning the theories of robotic manipulators. Topics contain frame transformations, manipulator kinematics, inverse kinematics, dynamics, trajectory planning, manipulator design, control of manipulators, robot programming languages.

name.zh: 綠色與循環經濟的思維與實踐
name.en: Thinking and Practices of A Green and Circular Economy

description.zh: 全球環境及永續發展問題的解決，必須從宏觀的視野分析及規劃，並擬定能適合符合當地的策略及做法，方能竟其功。本課程著重於從系統的角度，制度經濟的方法論制度經濟的方法論，辨別及解決環境問題，並從了解其制度的影響探討最適的管理工具。學生將會學到了解何謂系統思考、環境與經濟系統運作的基本原理、系統化管理的工具，並學習進行成本效益分析及經濟影響性分析。本課程原則上分為以下各主題：1.	綠色經濟的簡介2.	市場失靈與環境永續3.	環境政策工具與法令4.	環境保護之成本效益分析5.	邁向綠色經濟，政策實務(一)：廢棄物管理6.	邁向綠色經濟，政策實務(二)：土壤及地下水污染管理7.	邁向綠色經濟，政策實務(三)：空氣，水、廢棄物之分析8.	邁向循環經濟 (四)：商業模式分析9.	邁向循環經濟 (五)：物質流模式分析10.	全球貿易與環境11.	綠色設計與行銷12.	綠色標章、綠色採購與綠色供應鏈13.	綠色金融14.	企業環境管理實務（1）15.	企業環境管理實務（2）16.	企業環境管理實務（3）
description.en: Global environmental and sustainability problems, such as pollution, climate change, poverty etc. are so huge and complicated, hence for solving those problems one must analyze and see things from a boarder and systems perspective, so that one will not fix one problem but create another problem to somewhere else or sometime in the future. In this course, students will be taught how to think in a systematic way when dealing with global environmental and sustainability problems and solve them from economic perspective. Students also will also be taught the technique of cost-benefit analysis and economic impact assessment, and which will be used for students to practice how to solve problem economically. Actually, similar technique will also be applied to individuals for helping their personal life.This course includes the following topics:1.	Introduction to a green economy2.	Market failure and environmental sustainability3.	Environmental policy tools and regulations4.	Cost-bene

name.zh: 遊戲式數位學習專題研究

description.zh: 探討遊戲式數位學習之相關原理、設計、以及實務應用。內容包括遊戲式數位學習之優點、特性、限制、科技、媒體、設計與發展、系統、實際案例、未來趨勢等。
description.en: The course aims to explore advanced issues on game-based e-learning including its characteristics, advantages and limitations, technology and media involved, design and development, system and practical cases, and future trends, etc.

description.zh: 組織行為是採用分析的方法，了解研究解個體行為在個人、團體、組織三個層次中的行為表現，並應用相關學理知識提高組織效能，尤其將焦點放在如何提高員工的生產力、降低離職率與曠職率，增加滿意度等四個變項上。
description.en: Organizational behavior (OB) is a field of research that investigates the impact that individuals, groups, and structure have on behavior within an organization, and then it applies that knowledge to make organizations work more effectively.  Specifically, OB focuses on how to improve productivity, reduce absenteeism and turnover, and increase employee citizenship and job satisfaction.

name.zh: 遊戲式數位學習專題研究

description.zh: 探討遊戲式數位學習之相關原理、設計、以及實務應用。內容包括遊戲式數位學習之優點、特性、限制、科技、媒體、設計與發展、系統、實際案例、未來趨勢等。
description.en: The course aims to explore advanced issues on game-based e-learning including its characteristics, advantages and limitations, technology and media involved, design and development, system and practical cases, and future trends, etc.

name.en: Special Topics on Surface Analysis for Materials

description.zh: 本課程介紹各種分析材料表面性質的方法。藉著利用光子、電子、原子、或離子與材料表面的物理或化學作用，來獲得有關材料表面的組成、結構、化學鍵結、電子組態於表面形貌等訊息。所要介紹的表面分析儀器包括；X光電子光譜儀(XPS)、歐傑電子光譜儀（AES）、低能電子繞射儀(LEED)、電子穿隧掃描儀(STM)、表面振動光譜儀(surface vibrational spectroscopy)、程式控溫脫附法(TPD)及真空技術。
description.en: The course introduces various surface analysis methods, including XPS, AES, LEED, STM, surface vibrational spectroscopy, and TPD. From the physical and chemical interaction between photons、electrons、atoms and ions with surfaces, the surface properties, including surface composition, surface structure, surface topography, electronic structure, and chemical bonding will be probed.

description.zh: 此課程係提供對纖維材料加工特論之研究與理論有興趣的研究生。教學內容包括纖維、紗、織物的製造與加工方法；紡織物補強複合材料的製造與加工方法；射出、擠壓、熱壓及高溫高壓與複合成形方法；微細與超微細粒子在纖維材料上之應用；纖維材料之印染與整理加工；纖維材料在電子、航太、醫學、交通與農業材料上之應用。
description.en: This program is designed for graduate students who are interested in research and theoretical aspects of fiber materials processing and manufacturing. Lecture courses, organized on a modular basis, are provided in textiles (fiber, yarn, fabric) manufacturing and processing methods; textiles reinforced composite materials manufacturing and processing methods; injection, extrude and hot press fabricated methods; high pressure and temperature, microwave, and composite fabricated methods; use of fine and superfine particle in textile materials; printing and finishing for textiles; use of textiles in electronic, aerospace, medical, automobile, and agriculture materials ....etc.

name.en: An Advanced study on green Building

description.zh: 一、教學目標：1.	學習且體認國內外綠建築、環境共生建築及永續經營建築之課題與本質。研討國內外對其課題之解決方法，並培養研擬課題與本土化規劃設計方法之能力。二、教學內容：1.	綠建築、環境共生建築、永續建築之內涵。2.	研討地球環境、人類生活環境及建築環境之相互關係。3.	研討環境共生與綠建築之本質。4.	研討綠建築與生命週期各階段之環境課題。5.	研討國內外綠建築規劃、設計技術及解決方法。6.	研討綠社區、綠都市之發展規劃。
description.en: 1.	The contect of Green Building, Symbiosis Building and Sustainable Building.2.	Study of relation between globe environment, hurman life environment and architecture environment.3.	The nature of  Green Building and Symbiosis Building.4.	The discussion of Green Building and Life Cycle.5.	The technology and method of Green Building Planning.6.	The Planning of Green Community and Green City.

description.zh: 本課程授課主要內容分為三部分：第一部份為都市防災概論，此部分主要針對國內外文獻作一回顧，進而瞭解都市防災整體架構，區分為（1）文獻回顧；（2）防災基本計畫；及（3）防災整體架構等。期使國內都市計畫能逐步邁向防災都市計畫，以建立『安全都市』為目標。此部分的主要內容區分為：（1）都市災害風險理念的形成；（2）防災都市計畫與地區防災系統規劃；（3）都市計畫防災系統規劃原則；（4）都市計畫防災作業準則內容架構；（5）都市計畫防災作業準則；（6）安心都市計畫的形成與實現。第三部分為實務操作部分，以草屯鎮為例，藉九二一大地震的實例，深入探討災情調查的方法，實際調查狀況及研訂災後重建的程序與計畫內容，期望成為國內都市重建計畫的範例，主要內容區分為：（1）緒論；（2）重建理論；（3）草屯鎮現況發展；（4）災情調查方法與重建程序之建立；（5）災情調查分析與重建計畫內容研訂等。
description.en: The subject will be presented in three partsPart One - (1) Literature retrospection; (2) Fundamental planning for disaster prevention; (3) An integrated disaster prevention organization.Part Two -The major contents to be addressed include (1) Formation of urban disaster cataclysm and risk; (2) Urban disaster prevention plan and regional disaster protection system planning; (3) Principles for planning disaster prevention system in urban plan; (4) Operational standards and organization for urban disaster prevention; (5) Operational guidelines for urban disaster prevention; (6) Realization and formation of trouble free urban plan.Party Three -. The major contents are (1) Introduction; (2) rehabilitation theory; (3) Current development in Tsaotun City; (4) Establishment of damage survey method and rehabilitation procedures; (5) Detail analysis of damage survey report and preparation of rehabilitation plan content.

description.zh: 歷史發展過程中，建構出具有價值或特色的建築物、發展出很豐富的聚落、或保存了珍貴的文化資產，這些資訊對於個人或群體的知識或感受將有明顯的幫助。在本專題中，每一個講題都具有單獨而完整的事物，以及不同的思考點、不同的切面、不同的關懷點、甚至於不同的情感。這些講題都是為了因應不同的對象、不同期待、不同層級及面向規劃而成。

description.zh: 在網路時代所產生龐大、複雜以及異質的資料環境下，大數據分析 (Big Data Analysis) 已經成為產業界人士必備的關鍵能力。然而，目前的大數據分析談的人多，做的人少，因此，本課程將從HADOOP生態體系 (Hadoop Ecosystem) 以及NOSQL資料庫 (NOSQL Database) 開始介紹，讓同學了解目前大數據分析中的熱門套件及概念，接著介紹大數據分析的核心工具?資料探勘方法 (Data Mining techniques) 的操作，期望建立同學大數據分析的必備概念外，更能建構大數據分析的基本操作能力。
description.en: Big data analysis is become an essential and key skill in the internet era because data is more and more large, complex, and heterogeneous. The component of Hadoop ecosystem and NOSQL database will be included in this course. Besides, the core concept of big data analysis, data mining techniques, will also be introduced. Students will learn how to implement big data analysis with related software.

description.zh: 大稻埕文創社區經營結合歷史、建築、文化、音樂、茶道、祭典與近代社會運動、歷史遺跡，組合成豐富的大稻埕文化，藉由對此社區活動的認識，結合現代文創元素，讓學子對台北的古遺跡有更深刻的認識，並打造「大稻埕」成為歷史街區活化的國際品牌，期盼在提升台灣學子的「就業即戰力」與「國際移動力」的同時，也成為當今我國文化外交戰略的重要環節。
description.en: The community management of Dadaocheng creative zone combines her own history, architecture, culture, music, tea ceremony, ceremonies and modern social movements, historical relics into a rich specific Dadaocheng culture, through propagating her community activities combined with modern creative elements.  We expect our students to improve their " employment agility" and "international mobility", by enabling them to have a deeper understanding of specific Dadaocheng culture. And then, Dadaocheng being an international brand is an important part of Taiwanese cultural diplomacy strategy.

description.zh: 本課程旨在介紹英語全球化、全球英語，以及英語作為國際語言的發展與相關論述，並針對英語在全球擴散的現象，檢視相關的概念與理論。本課程將探討因英語全球化所造成，在社會語言學、文化、政治經濟與教育等方面的重要議題，以及與全球英語相關的議題與爭論。
description.en: This course aims to provide students with an overview of the spread of the English language around the world, the emergence of English varieties, and the development of the popularization of English as a lingua franca. It examines the various concepts and theories developed in academia to account for the unprecedented global expansion of English. Through readings and class discussion, this course will look at key sociolinguistic, cultural, politico-economic and educational issues arising from the spread of English as well as the current issues and debates surrounding Global Englishes. Students will be encouraged to conduct original research on or detailed analysis of the implications of English as the international language.

description.en: This subject is arranged to introduce the principles and techniques required in Automatic Optical Inspection (AOI). The subject includes the following subtopics: introduction to precision metrology and machine vision, the measurement principles and methods used in the 2D AOI, the measurement principles and techniques used in the 3D AOI, image processing and artificial intelligence methods used in automatic inspection, intelligent measurement systems, AOI system integration and conclusion.

description.en: Information and network technologies have promoted the traditional concurrent engineering to the next generation. The collaborative e-design and e-development concept has been more popular in industries. This course is introduced from the concept of collaborative product design and development to help students understanding the importance of collaborative e-design and e-development in modern industries. Furthermore, the business model analysis method is provided to construct the collaborative environment of e-design and e-development. In addition, some real cases of data management, configuration management, and workflow management are mentioned.

description.en: The theme of the course is "Sustainable Architecture". It aims to provide a forum to examine and discuss solution-oriented methods for implementing sustainable development, and to stimulate more ideas and useful insights regarding architecture development within the context of sustainability. In an effort to explore and map the challenges and opportunities of sustainable development, this course aims to address the various aspects of architecture & urban development in accordance with the principles of sustainability. These themes will address issues but not limit to, architectural design, ecological and social sustainability, economic and environmental sustainability, environmentalism.

name.zh: 企業智能化營運實務與應用
name.en: Enterprise Information and Intelligent Enterprise Applications

description.zh: 採混成教學，透過面授了解企業，從產業、行業到組織，及資訊系統應用實務。藉由數位課程學習企業內各職能作業流程及ERP系統功能。配合上機實作及老師案例引導，強化系統運用與企業流程整合。
description.en: By mixed teaching methods, help students to learn enterprises from their industries, organizations and information system applications; Use digital learning courses to introduce tasks of roles in business and ERP system functions. Besides, online practices will be provided. With case studies guided by our instructors, students might learn how to integrate the system with actual enterprise operating procedures.

notes: 經管大碩與產業接軌合開

name.zh: 創業講座—創新者跟你想的不一樣
name.en: Entrepreneurship Lectures-  Innovators are different from what you think

description.zh: 隨著科技的發展與產值快速成長，網路、電商、商業新模式等各式創業大行其道，成為許多創業者的新選擇，本課程邀請國內知名創業楷模或創業成功典範之企業經理人分享創業成功之經驗。以真實具體的創業經驗為教材，讓學生更深刻體驗創業家之精神。希冀以觀摩學習典範企業的具體經驗，帶領學生學習企業創新與創業的思維，進而激發學生追求成就的渴望，強化青年學子對人生願景的規劃。
description.en: Along with the prosperous development of Internet, the output value of E-commerce is growing fast. Launching a business on the internet has become a new choice for many entrepreneurs. We invite the domestic business manager, as the model of outstanding and successful enterprise, to share his experiences of achievement with students. By offering the real and specific examples, business manager will make students learn further about the enterprisers' entrepreneurship. Through their experiences, we hope students can learn innovations and creations of enterprise; furthermore, students can be inspired to pursue their ambition to strengthen their wills to plan the future.

description.zh: 控制理論基礎，冷凍控制系統方式簡介，冷凍系統控制元件認識，冷凍循環運轉控制系統規劃，冷凍應用環境溫溼度及污染控制，除霜、防溼及防凍控制設計，冷凍應用節能控制系統規劃設計
description.en: Fundamentals of control logic, introduction to refrigerating control methods, controlled devices and controllers, control circuit design for refrigerating cycle operating, schematic design of space temperature, humidity and contaminants control, Defrost, frost and moisture control design, energy saving control system design

description.zh: 本課程分為上下學期，介紹如何將金融操作方式，以明確演算法去定義、描述，進而用R語言、XQ、或MultiChart去模擬、執行。內容包括: 程式交易概論、交易策略研發、回測系統、資金管理。此外，本課程邀請創富創投團隊與嘉實資訊擔任業師課程指導。創富創投董事長 張智超 先生為國內知名冠軍操盤人，曾在富邦與國票證卷10年賺逾過20億。其團隊開授課程主題如下：基本面研究、產業面連結、交易面訓練、操盤面實戰。嘉實資訊為國內最大財金資訊軟體公司，其業師將帶領同學接觸XQ交易系統，撰寫XS語法。
description.en: This course is divided into two semesters. It introduces how to use financial operations to define and describe clearly the algorithm, and then uses R language, XQ, or MultiChart to simulate and execute. Contents include: Introduction to program trading, trading strategy development, backtesting, and fund management.. In additions, this course invites the Chuang Fu Venture Capital Team and  SysJust company to serve as a professional mentor. Mr. Zhang Zhichao, chairman of Chuangfu Venture Capital, is a well-known trader and has earned more than 2 billion NTD in Fubon and Waterland Securities in 10 years. The theme of the courses offered by the team is as follows: Fundamental research, industrial connection, trading surface training, practical trading, and actual operation of company funds. SysJust company is the largest financial information software company in Taiwan. Its industry lecturer will lead students to contact the XQ trading system and write XS grammar for financial tradin

notes: 科研243教室 /資財四資財所與產業接軌合開

description.zh: 本課程能夠讓修課學生靈活的運用各種大數據探勘與分析演算法、社群文字探勘及機器學習演算法等技術，分析各項金融資料。透過實際金融數據分析案例及實務資料操做，補強資訊背景學生之金融產業知識，並讓修課同學了解資訊科技於金融資料分析之實務應用，以培育業界金融科技人才。課程內容以模組的方式進行，包括：「數據分析」、「機器學習」以及「金融大數據實務」。課程也將擷取網路中的開放財經數據，進行金融資料之預處理、分析及預測結果之驗證，協助修課學生建構高預測能力及穩定性之數據探勘模型。
description.en: This course teaches students to use various techniques of big data mining and analysis algorithms, text mining of social media, and machine learning algorithms to analyze financial data. In this course, by case study and open software operation (such as R ), we will strengthen the financial knowledge of information background students. Also, the students can understand how to select and well organize various information technologies (particular the data analysis technique) to analyze financial data. The course is organized in modules, including "Data Analysis", "Machine Learning" and "Big Data Practice for Financial Data analysis." The course will also teach students to collect open financial data from the Internet, and experience the KDD process, including: data pre-processing and data analysis, to establish a prediction model with high forecasting ability and stability.

notes: 科研240教室 / 與資財四甲合開

description.zh: 本次更利用業界常用之光學模擬軟體RSoft以及COMSOL進行光學元件與系統設計，主要探討近代光學之應用，如光通訊，光敏材料和奈米光學結構等主題進行設計與討論。課程最後使用專題來檢驗學生學習成果，可探討題目有一維光子晶體：薄膜干涉、抗反射膜設計，二維/三維光子晶體，微結構之穿透反射頻譜、能隙分布（BandGap）計算，Meta-materials：微結構天線、光學抗反射結構（隱形斗篷），基礎波動光學：雙狹縫干涉、單狹縫繞射、散射（Rayleigh Scattering、Mie Scattering）等。
description.en: The used tool for this class is RSoft and COMSOL, common-used optical simulation software in industries. Students should present their work through final project presentations to examine their learning outcomes. The topics for final project include one-dimensional photonic crystals: thin film interference, anti-reflection film design, 2D/3D photonic crystals, transmission spectrum of microstructure, Bandgap calculation , Meta-materials: Micro-structured antennas, optical anti-reflective structures (invisible cloaks), basic wave optics: double-slit interferences, single-slit diffraction, and scattering (Rayleigh Scattering, Mie Scattering).

notes: PBL, 光電四與光電所合開/計中電腦教室

description.zh: 產品企劃對於一家公司來說非常重要，因為如果做得好，它可以減少資源支出，增加收入並創造利潤。新產品開發時，產品企劃的嚴謹與洞見為影響產品成敗的重要因素，本課程將介紹產品企劃的基本觀念、產品開發流程、產品策略、產品生命週期、市場區隔與企畫書的撰寫等。本課程以實際產品企劃案例作為教材，導入情境式教學，讓學生融入產品企劃個案之實境，於課堂上共同討論如何擬定個案的處理方式與企劃方法，達到理論與實務充分的對話。
description.en: Product planning is very important to a company because, when done properly, it can reduce resource expenditures, drive revenues, and generate profitability. In the development of new products, Product planning is an important factors affecting the success or failure of products. This course will introduce the basic concepts of product planning, product development process, product strategy, product life cycle, market segmentation, and Product planning book.This course takes real product planning cases as teaching materials, import situational teaching, and integrates students into the realities of product planning cases. We will discuss how to formulate the right decision-making and planning methods in class to achieve a dialogue between theory and practice.

name.zh: 工業設計與物聯網專題
name.en: Special topics in Industrial Design for the Internet of Things

description.zh: 本課程透過案例研究與設計實作，幫助學生學習工業設計師應該具備的物聯網基本概念，以及基於設計思考的物聯網產品設計原理與方法。
description.en: By case studies and design projects, this course is to help students learn the basic concepts of Internet of Things (IoT), and the principles and methods of IoT product design based with design thinking.

name.zh: 工業設計與物聯網專題
name.en: Special topics in Industrial Design for the Internet of Things

description.zh: 本課程透過案例研究與設計實作，幫助學生學習工業設計師應該具備的物聯網基本概念，以及基於設計思考的物聯網產品設計原理與方法。
description.en: By case studies and design projects, this course is to help students learn the basic concepts of Internet of Things (IoT), and the principles and methods of IoT product design based with design thinking.

description.zh: 現代控制理論簡介、線性空間分析、狀態方程式及響應，可控制性及可觀測性、穩定性分析、狀態回授及估測、控制器設計及應用、觀測。
description.en: Introduction of Modern Control Theory﹒Linear space Analysis , State equation and Response, Controllability and Observability , Stability Analysis, State Feedback and Estimation, Controller Design and Applications, Observer Design and Applications, Nonlinear systems, Time varying Systems, Applications of Modern Control theory.

notes: 電機所、自動化所、機電外生與電資外生所合開

description.zh: 本課程以哈佛個案教學方法進行，在每個個案討論當中，同時由行銷管理、財務管理、科技管理、生產管理領域老師教授。可以讓學生在學管理工功能之外，還可以學習這些管理功能的整合，學期末並有分組個案競賽，促進團隊互動與學習。
description.en: The Integrated Management Case Studies would be taught by case methods from Havard Business School’s cases. Every case will be taught from Marketing, Financing, Technology Management, and Operation Management areas faculty. This course focus on the integration of management functions. The case contest will be hold on the final week to encourage team building and learning.

description.zh: 本課程以哈佛個案教學方法進行，在每個個案討論當中，同時由行銷管理、財務管理、科技管理、生產管理領域老師教授。可以讓學生在學管理工功能之外，還可以學習這些管理功能的整合，學期末並有分組個案競賽，促進團隊互動與學習。

Every case will be taught from Marketing, Financing, Technology Management, and Operation Management areas faculty. This course focus on the integration of management functions. The case contest will be hold on the final week to encourage team building and learning.

description.en: The Integrated Management Case Studies would be taught by case methods from Havard Business School’s cases. Every case will be taught from Marketing, Financing, Technology Management, and Operation Management areas faculty. This course focus on the integration of management functions. The case contest will be hold on the final week to encourage team building and learning.

description.zh: 本課程是教導學生金融科技的基本概念，使學生能夠建立金融科技的創新應用。內容包括:金融科技概論、金融科技商業模式、P2P 借貸、虛擬貨幣、雲端服務、第三方支付、群眾募資、P2P 匯兌、區塊鏈、跨境電商、程式交易、機器人理財與期末專題製做。
description.en: This course is to instruct students the basic concepts of financial technology and to enable students to develop innovative applications of financial technology. The contents include introduction to financial technology, business models of financial technology, P2P lending, virtual money, third-party payment, crowd funding, P2P remittance, blockchain, cross-border e-commerce, program trading, and robotic financial advisory.

description.zh: 本課程提供學生選擇有興趣的休閒或運動選擇。使學生能透過健康的方式釋放壓力及管理情緒。
description.en: This course provides students the opportunity to select specific activities they are interested in. Thus, students can release their stresses and manage their emotions in some healthy way.

name.zh: 智慧生活與使用者經驗

description.zh: 此課程旨在以人因觀點，探討智慧生活之產品與服務。授課主要以個案探討方式，使學生了解人因相關概念與方法，特別是使用者經驗與人本設計，以及如何將這些概念與方法導入組織中，並應用於相關產品與服務之開發與設計。
description.en: This course focuses on the products and services of smart living from the perspective of human factors. Courses will generally be taught through case studies. Students will learn the concepts and methods related to human factors, especially user experience and user centered design, and how these concepts and methods to be introduced into organizations and applied to the development and design of those products and services.

name.zh: 智慧機器人與AR/VR 應用專題
name.en: Special Topics in Intelligent Robot and AR/VR Applications

description.zh: 本課程之目標在於介紹智慧機器人及AR/VR之知識領域相關議題，關於智慧機器人部分，主要包括：機器人學原理與分析方法、機器人的設計分析製造與應用、智慧機器人的歷史與未來的發展、機器視覺之原理與應用等；關於AR/VR部分，此概論課程將介紹AR/VR相關技術於現今智慧製造與服務業之應用，並展示AR/VR於不同工作環境設計之應用實例，如VR/AR軟硬體操作及體驗、各式追蹤系統介紹等等。
description.en: This is an introduction course of intelligent robot and applications of augmented reality and virtual reality. The course is designed to provide the followings topics: 1. fundamentals of robotics and analytical methodologies, 2. design, manufacturing, and applications of robots, 3. the history and the future of intelligent robot, 4. fundamentals and practical applications of machine vision, 5. overview about AR and VR technology applied in smart manufacturing and service industries, 6. applications and examples of AR/VR, e.g. software and hardware design and operation, various tracking systems, etc.

description.zh: 本課程之主要目的在於介紹投資理論、投資分析與投資管理，使學員能在瞬息萬變的經濟環境中，建構出滿足自身目標的投資格局與投資策略。本課程內容涵蓋：(1) 投資學原理；(2) 金融市場與商品；(3) 投資組合管理；(4) 財金資料庫；(5) 投資個案等相關議題。藉由探討這些投資人所關注的課題，並搭配財金數據資料的分析應用，使學員能具有投資分析與決策制定的能力。
description.en: The course aims to introduce students to major issues currently of concern to all investors. The purpose is to make all the material accessible to students of investment analysis and management. The major topics of this course include the following: (1) principles of investments, (2) financial markets and instruments, (3) portfolio management, (4) economics and finance database, and (5) case study in finance and investments. It is expected to give students the skills to conduct a sophisticated assessment of watershed current issues and debates covered by the popular media as well as finance journals.

description.zh: 本課程上半學期以R語言為工具，處理分析金融交易資料於股票期貨與選擇權等商品，包含理論模擬與實務分析。
description.en: In this course, we use R language as a tool to deal with the analysis of financial data in the stock, futures and options and other commodities, including theoretical simulation and practical analysis.

description.zh: 本課程重點在於使學生瞭解研究的本質、研究的類型、科學研究特性、方法論、衡量程序與工具、問卷設計、資料收集、資料分析、研究論文撰寫方法，在從事管理問題研究時，如何正確選用合適方法，且取得正確資訊。
description.en: Ph.D. Seminar in Research Methods includes the following topics: The nature of Research, Research Methods? the character of science research. And the research topic selection, literature survey, methodology and data collection, and preparation of a research proposo.

description.zh: NA
description.en: NA

notes: 本課程不列入畢業學分

description.zh: 本課程目的在提升學生在科技與服務創新的知識及了解其各種不同的特性本課程旨在討論服務業可能衍生的經營策略，尤其是與網際網路相關的各種新興的服務產業。
description.en: This is an advanced course for Master students to enhance their theoretical foundation in Technology and Service Innovation. Issues involved are: Systematic View of Technology Innovation; Service Innovation; Service Management; New Service Development

description.zh: 本科目主旨在於加強學生使用語言的表達能力、並促使學生更加容易瞭解學術論文。每週的課程是由一系列連貫性的論文來引導學生去學習即分析論文，並能以口語、寫作正確地表達出所分析論文的含義。這些所提供的研究論文都具備可精闢分析的要素。這些文章的內容有包含習慣的不同、事件的相對面、意見的分歧、喜好的差異、演繹法即歸納法得的結論等等。
description.en: This course aims to enhance oral and written communication skills and in the process provide a greater understanding of the philosophy underlying academic discourse. Weekly units are oriented around a progressive series of tasks which consider academic texts in context and require learners to understand, analyse and produce spoken and written texts appropriate to the context of academic English. The contextualisation of these tasks is the philosophical aspects of critical analysis. Themes, such as the difference between convention, fact, opinion and preference; deductive and inductive proof; validity and truth; evidence; and the ethics of persuasion, are the basis on which the skills are taught.

description.zh: 本科目主旨在於加強學生使用語言的表達能力、並促使學生更加容易瞭解學術論文。每週的課程是由一系列連貫性的論文來引導學生去學習即分析論文，並能以口語、寫作正確地表達出所分析論文的含義。這些所提供的研究論文都具備可精闢分析的要素。這些文章的內容有包含習慣的不同、事件的相對面、意見的分歧、喜好的差異、演繹法即歸納法得的結論等等。

name.zh: 資料探勘技術與產業大數據應用
name.en: Data Mining Techniques and Industrial Big Data Applications

description.zh: 本課程第一階段乃詳述資料探勘技術之原理與應用案例，包含分類、估計、預測、關聯分組、同質分組等範疇。第二階段乃敘述大數據理論、技術、與實務，包含製造業、零售業、服務業等應用實例。
description.en: This class will first help students familiarize themselves with the data mining techniques, including classification, estimation, prediction, affinity grouping, clustering, among others. In the second part, the big data analytics will be introduced and its potential applications in the manufacturing, retail and service industries will be investigated.

description.zh: 本課程為現任與職前英語教師所設計，主旨在介紹電腦/科技輔助語言教學、電腦媒介溝通、以及線上教學的近年發展、當前議題的相關理論、研究與應用；以引導學生分析電腦與科技於英語輔助語言學習中扮演的教育角色，並因應電腦、科技、與學習者表現進行評量、評估以及施測方法之選擇為本課程重點。
description.en: This graduate-level course is designed to introduce recent development and current issues in theories, research, and practice of TELL (technology-enhanced language learning), CALL (computer-assisted language learning), CMC (computer-mediated communication, and online learning to in-service and pre-service teachers of English. The purpose is to guide students to analyze the pedagogical role of implementing computers and technology in the language classroom and for them to understand the utilization of computers and technology in assisting learners to learn English. Assessment, evaluation, and testing measurements adopted in CALL, TELL and learner performance will also be discussed.

description.zh: 本課程主要在論述計畫於都市發展過程的干預以及維護環境永續發展之分派與管理角色，其內容包括：    一、 規劃、規劃師與計畫    二、 1800年到1900年的都市發展    三、 都市計畫的先驅著    四、 戰後規劃的開創    五、 國土與區域計畫    六、 都市與都市區域計畫    七、 歐美的都市計畫    八、 未來聚落的都市規劃
description.en: This course is mainly to discuss the role of planning as a form of intervention in the development process, and introduce the role of planning in the allocation and management of a sustainable environment. Thus the course including:    1. Planning, planners and plans    2. The origins: urban growth from 1800 to 1940    3. The seers: pioneer thinkers in urban planning, from        1880 to 1945    4. The creation of the postwar planning machine, from        1940 to 1952    5. National/regional planning from 1945 to 1990    6. Planning for cities and city regions from 1945 to        1990    7. Planning in Western Europe, United States since 1945    8. Settlements into the 21st century

description.zh: 本課程以建築專業回應社會需求為依歸。針對台灣原住民部落之返鄉青年之居住與生產模式提出各項議題討論。藉由社區總體營造與民眾參與等方式，以一學期的進程發展新的部落建築形式與配置計畫，並在永續發展與保育並重的前提下，提出實質開發與營造施工的前期規劃。
description.en: This course introduces the theories, principles, and methods of designing and construction for local social issues in Taiwan. In this year, Focuses on the Settlements of aboriginal people, through cases studies and design practice, the courses seeks to expand the students understanding to the major components of site planning. The topics also focus on six premises:1.theories in relation to site planning;2.design sequences of site planning;3.investigations and analyses of the sites;4.planning and designing methods and their evaluations;5.environmental impact assessment and countermeasures.

notes: 建築三四與建都所日職合開

name.en: International Colloquy on Special Topics c

description.zh: 國合專題特論乃透過國際學者的講課，讓學生學習車輛工程系相關領域的重要知識及了解最先進之研究成果或最新開發成品。
description.en: This course is to provide the latest development or application on the Vehicle Engineering or Technology. Invited speakers/instructors are well-known scholars in the related areas.

description.zh: 為了鼓勵以及幫助學生用技術或者商業模式，聯合學校老師或是跨校同學，用商業的手段共同解決社會或者商業問題，本課程將以衝刺班的形式，邀請有創業經驗的老師、業師，透過工作坊的形式，幫助學生逐週的推進創業進度以及創業競賽演練，目標是幫助學生落實創業想法，應用在社會中並且帶來改變。
description.en: To encourage and help students using new technologies or new business models to solve problems in the society and the business world, this intense, pre-accelerator, 18-week course invites different professors and mentors with entrepreneurship experiences to help students develop their start-up ideas through workshops and startup competitions. The goal of this course is to help students realize their ideas and create actionable business solutions that can change the society.

name.en: Sampling and Analysis of Environmental Pollution

description.zh: 本課程以講授環境污染物之檢測分析為主,且偏重近代之精密儀器分析,使學生瞭解微量物性污染物之採樣品管及分析原理,此課程內容包括:1.概論2.檢測與分析之基本原理3.儀器分析導論4.半揮發性有機物之採樣與分析5.揮發性有機物之採樣與析析6.重金屬採樣與分析7.品管方法
description.en: To promote the knowledge of principle for students,the course,Sampling and Analysis on Environmental pollutants,focuses on microquantity pollutants.Contents of the course includes:Concept of sampling and analysis,Theorectical background.Principle of instrument analysis.Sampling and analysis for semi-volatile organics,aavolatile organics,and heavy metals.

description.zh: 本課程將透過介紹及研讀創新服務的標竿案例，以了解創新服務的本質與實質效益。學生將透過共同研討與分組實作的的方式，針對不同場域及技術的創新服務，透過資源整合的方式，提出具體的創新服務專案，並提出其評估的方法。
description.en: This course will provide the student basics knowledge and practical benefits of the innovative services through benchmark case introduction and study. Students will collaborate to each other to propose practical innovation service project proposal in the aspect of resources management, technology applications, service mechanism and associated assessment methods  in various domains.

description.zh: 先修課程：電子學或應用電子學、或負責教授同意。探討PN接面之特性、短通道效應、表面通道技術原理、費米能階等基本元件物理、及0.25-0.18微米以下需明瞭元件物理知識。
description.en: Basic physics of semiconductor device, sub-half micro CMOS device, characteristics of P/N junction, short channel effect, surface channel N/P device, Fermi-level etc. The relative physical knowledge of 0.25 um device is discussed as well.

description.zh: 本課程介紹機器人技術，程式，與應用各類基礎。其中包括機器人動作分析與控制、機器人程式語言、機器人運動學、夾爪與末端效應器之運用。 根據各階段實際操作 RV-M2 、CSIRB-2000 、以及 X-YETITE 各型機器人。 實驗包括機器人重現性、動作與路徑、順應性、棧板堆疊等。
description.en: This is an introduction course of Industrial Robot. The course is designed principally to provide the Followings topics: 1. fundamentals of robot technology, programming; and applications, 2. robot motion ,analysis and control 3. robot end effectors 4. robot cell design and control 5. assembly and inspection safety, training ,maintenance, and quality.

notes: 工管大三大四與工管所合開

description.zh: 本課程目的為培養大學生未來創新創業時所需具備的基礎能力與知識。本課程將針對以下幾個面向來授課。1. 觀察聯想力；2. 創新思考；3. 發現問題與解決問題；4. 人際關係；5. 價值主張；6. 商業模式。
description.en: The aim of this course is to build up students’ abilities and fundamental knowledge of innovation and entrepreneurships. The following topics are introduced: 1. Observation and associating. 2. Creative thinking. 3. Questioning and problem solving. 4. Human relation. 5. Value proposition. 6. Business model.

description.zh: 課程目標在教授學生生醫材料與醫療器材技術商品化之實務知識。首先介紹生醫材料產品之特性與市場概況，並由各國醫療法規為出發點，教導學生了解生醫材料產品上市所需之相關程序。特別透過實例之講解，引導學生了解設計、製造、測試三大重點之實務操作。包括產品設計之準則，ISO 13485醫療器材品質系統實務操作，臨床前生物相容測試以及臨床試驗之執行等。課程設計將著重實際法規之講解、實力講解與分析以工廠參觀。將由本校專任教師配合企業講師任教，培育學生迅速進入相關產業工作之能力。
description.en: The objective of this course it to illustrate the commercialization process for biomaterials products. The features and the marketing overview of biomaterials will be introduced first. The regulatory issues and the necessary procedures for the commercialization process will be introduced. By the case studies, it is designed to train the students about the necessary concepts of product design, manufacturing and testing processes. It consists of the product design guidelines, ISO 13485 medical products GMP, pre-clinical and clinical tests.

name.en: Special Topics on Interactive Media Design (I)

description.zh: 本課程之目標在於研討互動設計、互動媒體、互動藝術之相關研究專題，以文獻研讀、論文研讀討論以及個案研究為重點，藉由密集討論、書面報告以及設計專題之之研究與實作，學生可以有效率地交換意見，獲得更深入而廣泛的體驗，並具備研究、分析、實作之能力。本所以結合電子資訊、機電、人文、設計與藝術等各領域的學生，以整合培育互動媒體設計專業人才，因此，本課程之另一主要學習目標為建構一多元領域交互學習的環境，以專題導向式為學習模式，可分別組合具設計、藝術、資訊、機電等專長的研究生，協同完成互動媒體設計專題的研究，或是透過互動媒體設計個案研討、互動媒體設計專題創作的方式進行。教學將以課堂講授、論文研討與發表以及專題實作為主，並以報告、分組討論與發表以及實作作品為評量方式。
description.en: This course is to explore the fields of interaction design, interactive media and interactive art and focus on the literature study, paper discussion and case studies. With panel discussion, research report and design practice, graduate students can be able to learn the ability of research, analysis and practice by effectively exchange opinions and personal experience. The aim of graduate of interactive media design is to integrate different disciplines from computer science, mechatronics, human-culture and design and art so as to foster the professional of interactive media design. Therefore, one of the aims of this course is to construct  multi-disciplines learning environment which perform a topic-oriented study model. This study model formulates the graduate students of design, art, information and mechatronic disciplines to collaborate an interactive media design project. It may execute interactive media design by working with the form of case study or design creation. The teachin

description.zh: 本課程之目標在於從科學哲學層次、研究方法層次、與實際操作層次探討設計研究的本質，內容包括界定設計研究問題、選用適當的量化或質性研究方法與特定工具、研究結果詮釋、案例解析、以及論文寫作等，俾使同學具備研究之基礎觀念以及進行創作或理論論文寫作之能力。研究方法一強調量化研究，課程內容包含研究的基本概念、文獻探討、研究問題、研究變項、研究假設、研究設計、資料蒐集與分析、研究工具、研究樣本、研究倫理與研究論文撰寫等。教學以課堂講授與論文研討與發表為主要方式，並以隨堂測驗、報告與分組討論與發表為評量依據。
description.en: The aims of this course are to explore the nature of design research at three various levels of scientific philosophy, research methods, and practical execution. The contents involve the introduction of the definition of the design problems, selecting the quantitative or qualitative research methods and specific instruments, interpretation of research results, case studies, as well as writing a thesis.

description.zh: 每週以專題座談，討論專班師生各進行中的研究計畫。
description.en: A weekly seminar discusses the current progress of individual projects.

description.zh: 本課程之目標在於介紹人本設計 (User-Centered Design, UCD) 之理論與應用。藉由本課程的學習，學生能習得互動設計過程中所需要之關鍵概念-以使用者為中心之設計，課程以人-機-境之架構為基礎進行相關知識之講授，並透過案例之研討了解其應用。課程內容包含使用者經驗與需求、互動環境、使用性設計與評估、以使用者為中心之創新產品設計與開發、設計心理學以及通用設計等。教學將以課堂講授、專家座談、個案研討等方式進行，並以報告繳交以及分組討論與發表為評量方式。
description.en: This course is focused on introducing the theories, application and research of User-Centered Design (UCD). In this course, students can understand the key element, UCD, of interactive design. This course is set up under the structure of Human-Machine-Scenario theory and case study. The contents include user experience and requirements, interactive scenario, usability design and evaluation, user-centered product design and development, design psychology and universal design. The course is preceded by means of lecturing, professional seminar and case study, and evaluated by students' reports, group discussion and presentation.

description.zh: 數位製造為一利用數位輔助設計軟體與製造工具將設計想法實現的過程。本課程將這個過程所需要的數位技術模組化，並以系統性的方式逐一介紹各技術模組的理論與操作，藉以培養以三維方式進行設計思考，並能以數位設計與製造流程來實現設計的能力。
description.en: Digital fabrication is a process that realizes a design idea through the use of 3D modeling and manufacturing tools. The modularized technologies related to the digital fabrication will be introduced systematically in this course. The aim of this course is to extend the computer-aided design workflow from design thinking to digital fabrication.

description.zh: 本課程將透過介紹及研讀創新服務的標竿案例，以了解創新服務的本質與實質效益。學生將透過共同研討與分組實作的的方式，針對不同場域及技術的創新服務，透過資源整合的方式，提出具體的創新服務專案，並提出其評估的方法。
description.en: This course will provide the student basics knowledge and practical benefits of the innovative services through benchmark case introduction and study. Students will collaborate to each other to propose practical innovation service project proposal in the aspect of resources management, technology applications, service mechanism and associated assessment methods  in various domains.

description.zh: 現代通訊與訊號處理系統仰賴電路、硬體與軟體之間的協同運作，因此通訊工程師應具備必要的軟體設計的能力。本課程以建立此項核心能力為目標，並以C++為語言主要教學語言。學生須於課後投入約150~200小時完成一個通訊軟體設計專題。    本課程涵蓋下列主題：1	通訊軟體特性2	程序式程式設計3	物件式程式設計4	物件導向式程式設計5	泛型式程式設計：使用C++ 標準模板函式庫(STL)6	單元測試7	通訊軟體函式庫8	通訊軟體設計個案研9	通訊軟體設計專題
description.en: Modern communication and signal processing systems rely on the close collaboration of circuits, hardware, and software. Therefore, software design is one of the core capabilities that communication system engineers should possess. This course aims to establish this core capability using C/C++ as the working language. The student is expected to complete a term project that involves 150 to 200 hours of work off class.     The following topics are covered: 1	Characteristics of Communication Software2	Procedure-oriented programming3	Object-based programming4	Object-oriented programming5	Generic programming using C++ Standard Template Library (STL)6	Unit testing7	Communication libraries8	Case studies in communication software design9	Term project in communication software design

notes: 資工所和電資國際班合開
